碧绿的豌豆。
碧蓝的海洋
bìlán de hǎiyáng 
the blue sea
从我们的房子里可以看到远处的碧海蓝天。
Cóng wǒmen de fángzi lǐ kěyǐ kàndào yuǎnchù de bìhǎi lántiān。
We can see the sea, and sky in the distance from our house.
碧海蓝天烘衬着这座小岛，使它显得十分美丽。

Set against the blue see and sky, the island seems all the more beautiful.
天空澄净碧蓝，没有一丝云彩。

碧空
bìkōng 
a clear blue sky; an azure sky
孤帆远景碧空尽，唯见长江天际流。
Gūfān yuǎnjǐng bìkōngjìn，wéijiàn Chǎná Jiāng tiānjì liú。
The sail is lost in the boundless sky, where the only thing that one can see is the flowing of the Yangzi river.

bìyùzān
emerald hairpin
他站在岸边，呆呆地望着荡漾的碧波。
Tā zhàn zài ànbiān，dāidāi de wàng zhe dàngyàng de bìbō。
He stood by the bank of the river, staring blankly at the ripples in the water.
他躺在如茵的碧草上仰望天空。
Tā tǎng zài rúyīn de bìcǎo shàng yǎngwàng tiānkōng。
He lied on the grass, watching the sky.

The sail is lost in the boundless sky, where the only thing that one can see is the flowing of the Yangzi river.
夏天的时候，喝碧螺春可以防暑降温。
Xiàtiān de shíhou，hē bìluóchūn kěyǐ fángshǔ jiàngwēn。
Drinking biluochun, green tea originally produced in the Donting Mountains on the Taihu Lake of Jiangsu Province can prevent sunstroke and cools the body.
“上穷碧落下黄泉，两处茫茫皆不见。”
“Shàngqióng bìluò xiàhuángquán，liǎngchù mángmáng jiēbújiàn。”
He searched heaven and hell, but failed to find her.
她在院子里种了一棵碧桃。
Tā zài yuànzi lǐ zhòng le yì kē bìtáo。
She grew a flowering peach in the yard.
仰望碧天，他的心情豁然开朗。
Yǎngwàng bìtiān，tā de xīnqíng huōrán kāilǎng。
Looking up at the open sky, he suddenly cheered up.
他望着那碧油油的麦田，心中满是喜悦。
Tā wàng zhe nà bìyóuyóu de màitián，xīn zhōng mǎn shì xǐyuè。
He was filled with joy when he looked at the green cornfield.
“接天莲叶无穷碧，映日荷花别样红”。
“Jiētiān liányè wúqióngbì，yìngrì héhuā biéyànghóng”。
The green lotus leaves stretch to the horizon, and the lotus looks extremely bright under the sunshine.
紫禁城内的殿宇，金碧辉煌，异常雄伟。
Zǐjìnchéng nèi de diànyǔ，jīnbìhuīhuáng，yìcháng xióngwěi。
Palaces within the Forbidden City are grand and resplendent.
碧海蓝天烘衬着这座小岛，使它显得十分美丽。

I will treat you to have tea, which is biluochun tea picked before Pure Brightness.

In the vast expanse of grassland in the Inner Mongolia, lush green grass stretches as far as the eye can see.

One of the croupiers, a blonde girl, beckoned him to join the twenty-one table.
那个发牌员是个金发碧眼的女孩，示意他加入到第二十一点的赌局中。
A lot of girls like American guys, simply because they are athletic.
很多女孩儿都喜欢美国小伙子，就是因为他们身材高大，金发碧眼，还很热爱运动。
Jeffery fell in love with Beyonce at the first sight.
杰弗里第一次见到碧昂丝就爱上了她。

我们给那个金发碧眼的学生起了个绰号叫鬼魂。
Men are crazy for blondes.
Nánrén kěwàngzhe jīnfàbìyǎn de nǚláng。

They do not spoil Tenby \'s beauty.
Tāmen méiyǒu sǔnhuài téngbì de měilì。

She was a blonde bombshell.
Tā shì gè jīnfàbìyǎn de měinǚ。

宗庙
这座寺庙常有善男信女来朝拜。
Zhèzuò sìmiào cháng yǒu shànnánxìnnǚ lái cháobài。
Devotees often come to this temple to worship.
一些信徒们跪在串烟弥漫的寺庙里祈求神灵保佑。
Yìxiē xìntúmen guì zài chuànyān mímàn de sìmiào lǐ qíqiú shénlíng bǎoyòu。
Some disciples knelt down and prayed for the gods\' blessings at the temple, which was filled with strings of smoke.
抵近那座高山，可以发现有一座寺庙。
Dǐjìn nà zuò gāoshān，kěyǐ fāxiàn yǒu yízuò sìmiào。
Approaching that mountain, you will find a temple.
这些珍贵的古籍都保存在寺庙的地宫里面。
Zhèxiē zhēnguì de gǔjí dōu bǎocúnzài sìmiào de dìgōng lǐmian。
These precious ancient books were preserved in the temple\'s basement.
他看过了地脉，决定在这里建一座寺庙。
Tā kànguò le dìmài，juédìng zài zhèlǐ jiàn yízuò sìmiào。
After inspecting the geographical fengshui of this land, he decided to build a temple here.
前些时候，我和母亲观览了五台山的寺庙群。
Qiánxiē shíhou，wǒ hé mǔqīn guānlǎn le Wǔtái Shān de sìmiàoqún。
Earlier, my mother and I visited the group of temples on Wudai Mountain.
在寺庙我们合手祈祷。
Zài sìmiào wǒmen héshǒu qídǎo。
We put our palms together in prayer at the temple.
现在的雍和宫属于黄教的寺庙，香火很旺。
Xiànzài de yōnghégōng shǔyú huángjiào de sìmiào，xiānghuǒ hěnwàng。
Now Yonghegong is a temple belonging to the Yellow Hats, and it is very prosperous.
每逢既望之日他都会去寺庙烧香。
Měiféng jìwàng zhī rì tā dōuhuì qù sìmiào shāoxiāng。
He goes to the temple to burn joss sticks every 15th day of the month.
寺庙的后院就是僧人居住的寮房了。
Sìmiào de hòuyuàn jiùshì sēngrén jūzhù de liáofáng le。
The backyard of the temple is where the monks live.
寺庙后院的灵塔，存放着这位高僧的遗骨。
Sìmiào hòuyuàn de língtǎ，cúnfàng zhe zhèwèi gāosēng de yígǔ。
Inside the pagoda in the backyard of the temple, there lay the remains of the dignitary.
这座寺庙的香火很旺，前来拜佛许愿的人很多。
Zhèzuò sìmiào de xiānghuǒ hěnwàng，qiánlái bàifó xǔyuàn de rén hěnduō。
There are endless stream of pilgrims in this temple, who come here to worship the gods and pray.
叔叔在这家寺庙当行者。
Shūshu zài zhè jiā sìmiào dāng xíngzhě。
Uncle is a non-tonsured monk in this temple.
这座寺庙给人感觉阴森森的，站在大殿前都觉得恐怖。
Zhèzuò sìmiào gěi réngǎn jué yīnsēnsēn de，zhànzài dàdiàn qián dōu juédé kǒngbù。
The temple is ghastly, you will feel horrified even if you just stand before the main hall of the temple.
这些野猴常常进寺庙里偷吃斋果。
Zhèxiē yěhóu chángcháng jìn sìmiào lǐ tōuchī zhāiguǒ。
These wild monkeys usually sneak into the temple, and eat the offerings.
这座城市还保留着500多年前的寺庙。
Zhèzuò chéngshì háibǎoliúzhe wǔbǎiduōniánqiánde sìmiào。
A temple more than 500 years old is preserved in the town.
我国的寺观庙宇很多都是人文历史遗产，要有步骤地进行保护。
Wǒ guó de sìguān miàoyǔ hěnduō dōushì rénwén lìshǐ yíchǎn，yào yǒu bùzhòu de jìnxíng bǎohù。
Most temples in our country are a cultural and historical inheritance, which should be protected gradually.
寺庙
寺庙。
五台山寺庙很多。
这座寺庙经历了几百年风雨的侵蚀。
We had to climb some steps to reach the main temple.
我们要爬上一些台阶才能到达寺庙。
The temple\'s dome was supported by magnificent marble pillars.
寺庙的圆顶由很庄严的大理石柱支撑着。
Several Tibetan temples were destroyed during the Cultural Revolution.
数座西藏寺庙在文革时期被摧毁了。
Marc became a religious in this temple two years ago.
马克两年前在这个寺庙出家了。
This neighbor had many old temples.
这个地区有不少老寺庙。
He bursts into the temple gun blasting.
Tā xiàng sìmiào kāiqiāng shèjī。
他向寺庙开枪射击。
The once elegant temple lay in virtual ruin.
Céngjīng zhuāngyán de sìmiào shìshíshàng zhèng chǔyú huǐhuài zhuàngtài。
曾经庄严的寺庙事实上正处于毁坏状态。
These temples were mindlessly destroyed by the red guards.
Zhèxiē sìmiào bèi yúmèiwúzhī de hóngwèibīng dǎohuǐ le。
这些寺庙被愚昧无知的红卫兵捣毁了。
一些信徒们跪在串烟弥漫的寺庙里祈求神灵保佑。
Yìxiē xìntúmen guì zài chuànyān mímàn de sìmiào lǐ qíqiú shénlíng bǎoyòu。
Some disciples knelt down and prayed for the gods\' blessings at the temple, which was filled with strings of smoke.
每到农历初一，人们都要来到庙里祈求神佛的保佑。
Měi dào nónglì chūyī，rénmen dōuyào láidào miàolǐ qíqiú shénfó de bǎoyòu。
People come to the temple to ask for God\'s protection on the first day of every lunar month.
The deity was hidden in the deepest recesses of the temple.
Shén cángzài miàoyǔ bìkān de zuì shēnchù。
神藏在庙宇壁龛的最深处。

庙会
miàohuì
temple fair; fair
庙会上人们比肩继踵，真是热闹啊。
Miàohuì shàng rénmen bǐjiān jìzhǒng，zhēnshì rènào a。
The Temple Fair is busy and crowded today.
庙会上踩高跷的演员赢得了阵阵喝彩声。

At the Temple Fair, the stilt walker threceived a lot of applause after his performance.
在庙会上，我买了两碗茶汤。
Zài miàohuì shàng，wǒ mǎi le liǎng wǎn chátāng。
I bought two bowls of glutinous millet paste at the temple fair.
他经常到山乡写生，画了许多关于农村庙会赶集、过年嫁娶的风俗画。
Tā jīngcháng dào shānxiāng xiěshēng，huà le xǔduō guānyú nóngcūn miàohuì gǎnjí、guònián jiàqǔ de fēngsúhuà。
He often draws sketches in the countryside and has painted a lot of paintings of temple fairs and marriage scenes.
这个灯笼是在赶庙会的时候买的。
Zhège dēnglóng shì zài gǎn miàohuì de shíhou mǎi de。
The lantern was bought when I was visiting a temple fair.
庙会上人来人往，一片喧杂。
Miàohuì shàng rénlái rénwǎng，yí piàn xuānzá。
This Temple Fair is full of people, busy, and exciting.
每逢既望之日他都会去寺庙烧香。
Měiféng jìwàng zhī rì tā dōuhuì qù sìmiào shāoxiāng。
He goes to the temple to burn joss sticks every 15th day of the month.

庙里的大师父正在主持法会。
Miào lǐ de dàshīfù zhèngzài zhǔchí fǎhuì。

一些信徒们跪在串烟弥漫的寺庙里祈求神灵保佑。
Yìxiē xìntúmen guì zài chuànyān mímàn de sìmiào lǐ qíqiú shénlíng bǎoyòu。
Some disciples knelt down and prayed for the gods\' blessings at the temple, which was filled with strings of smoke.
庙里的大师父正在主持法会。
Miào lǐ de dàshīfù zhèngzài zhǔchí fǎhuì。
The Grand Master in the temple is chairing a meeting.
那座庙在两座山的当间儿。
Nà zuò miào zài liǎng zuò shān de dāngjiānr。
The temple is in the middle of the two mountains.
抵近那座高山，可以发现有一座寺庙。
Dǐjìn nà zuò gāoshān，kěyǐ fāxiàn yǒu yízuò sìmiào。
Approaching that mountain, you will find a temple.
这些珍贵的古籍都保存在寺庙的地宫里面。
Zhèxiē zhēnguì de gǔjí dōu bǎocúnzài sìmiào de dìgōng lǐmian。
These precious ancient books were preserved in the temple\'s basement.
他看过了地脉，决定在这里建一座寺庙。
Tā kànguò le dìmài，juédìng zài zhèlǐ jiàn yízuò sìmiào。
After inspecting the geographical fengshui of this land, he decided to build a temple here.
梵宫古庙，历来都建造在幽静山水之间。
Fàngōng gǔmiào，lìlái dōu jiànzào zài yōujìng shānshuǐ zhījiān。
Buddhist temples are usually built in the mountains or by the riverside.
他经常到山乡写生，画了许多关于农村庙会赶集、过年嫁娶的风俗画。
Tā jīngcháng dào shānxiāng xiěshēng，huà le xǔduō guānyú nóngcūn miàohuì gǎnjí、guònián jiàqǔ de fēngsúhuà。
He often draws sketches in the countryside and has painted a lot of paintings of temple fairs and marriage scenes.
这个灯笼是在赶庙会的时候买的。
Zhège dēnglóng shì zài gǎn miàohuì de shíhou mǎi de。
The lantern was bought when I was visiting a temple fair.
全国各地都有关帝庙，只是规模不同。
Quánguó gè dì dōu yǒu guāndìmiào，zhǐshì guīmó bùtóng。
There are Temples of Guan Yu all around the country. The only difference is that they are of various sizes.
前些时候，我和母亲观览了五台山的寺庙群。
Qiánxiē shíhou，wǒ hé mǔqīn guānlǎn le Wǔtái Shān de sìmiàoqún。
Earlier, my mother and I visited the group of temples on Wudai Mountain.
在寺庙我们合手祈祷。
Zài sìmiào wǒmen héshǒu qídǎo。
We put our palms together in prayer at the temple.
他从庙里请了一个护符，据说很灵的。
Tā cóng miào lǐ qǐng le yígè hùfú，jùshuō hěnlíng de。
He got a phylactery from the temple, which was said to be very efficacious.
现在的雍和宫属于黄教的寺庙，香火很旺。
Xiànzài de yōnghégōng shǔyú huángjiào de sìmiào，xiānghuǒ hěnwàng。
Now Yonghegong is a temple belonging to the Yellow Hats, and it is very prosperous.
每逢既望之日他都会去寺庙烧香。
Měiféng jìwàng zhī rì tā dōuhuì qù sìmiào shāoxiāng。
He goes to the temple to burn joss sticks every 15th day of the month.
寺庙的后院就是僧人居住的寮房了。
Sìmiào de hòuyuàn jiùshì sēngrén jūzhù de liáofáng le。
The backyard of the temple is where the monks live.
寺庙后院的灵塔，存放着这位高僧的遗骨。
Sìmiào hòuyuàn de língtǎ，cúnfàng zhe zhèwèi gāosēng de yígǔ。
Inside the pagoda in the backyard of the temple, there lay the remains of the dignitary.
这里的妈祖庙香火很盛，据说挺灵验的。
Zhèlǐ de māzǔmiào xiānghuǒ hěnshèng，jùshuō tǐng língyàn de。
The Mazu temple here attracts a large number of pilgrims, and it is said that it is quite effective.
每到农历初一，人们都要来到庙里祈求神佛的保佑。
Měi dào nónglì chūyī，rénmen dōuyào láidào miàolǐ qíqiú shénfó de bǎoyòu。
People come to the temple to ask for God\'s protection on the first day of every lunar month.
这座破庙里的石像已经破烂不堪，上面布满了蜘蛛网和灰尘。
Zhèzuò pòmiào lǐ de shí xiàng yǐjing pòlàn bùkān，shàngmiàn bùmǎn le zhīzhūwǎng hé huīchén。
The stone figures in this dilapidated temple are already in decay, covered with cobwebs and dust.
我国的寺观庙宇很多都是人文历史遗产，要有步骤地进行保护。
Wǒ guó de sìguān miàoyǔ hěnduō dōushì rénwén lìshǐ yíchǎn，yào yǒu bùzhòu de jìnxíng bǎohù。
Most temples in our country are a cultural and historical inheritance, which should be protected gradually.
这座寺庙的香火很旺，前来拜佛许愿的人很多。
Zhèzuò sìmiào de xiānghuǒ hěnwàng，qiánlái bàifó xǔyuàn de rén hěnduō。
There are endless stream of pilgrims in this temple, who come here to worship the gods and pray.
村子后面的山上有个土地庙，我时常去拜祭。
Cūnzi hòumiàn de shān shàng yǒu gè tǔdìmiào，wǒ shícháng qù bàijì。
There is a temple housing the god of earth on the hill at the back of the village, I often go there to worship.
在那座小有名气的土山上有一座庙。
Zài nà zuò xiǎoyǒu míngqì de tǔshān shàng yǒu yízuò miào。
There is a temple on that reasonable well-known earthen hill.
叔叔在这家寺庙当行者。
Shūshu zài zhè jiā sìmiào dāng xíngzhě。
Uncle is a non-tonsured monk in this temple.
庙会上人来人往，一片喧杂。
Miàohuì shàng rénlái rénwǎng，yí piàn xuānzá。
This Temple Fair is full of people, busy, and exciting.
这座寺庙给人感觉阴森森的，站在大殿前都觉得恐怖。
Zhèzuò sìmiào gěi réngǎn jué yīnsēnsēn de，zhànzài dàdiàn qián dōu juédé kǒngbù。
The temple is ghastly, you will feel horrified even if you just stand before the main hall of the temple.
岳庙内贡奉着岳飞的铜像。
Yuèmiào nèi gòngfèng zhe Yuè Fēi de tóng xiàng。
The copper figure of Yuefei is worshipped in the temple of Yuefei.
奶奶每年都会去岳庙祭祀。
Nǎinai měinián dōuhuì qù yuèmiào jìsì。
Every year, Grandma would go to the temple of Yuefei to offer sacrifices to the gods.
这些野猴常常进寺庙里偷吃斋果。
Zhèxiē yěhóu chángcháng jìn sìmiào lǐ tōuchī zhāiguǒ。
These wild monkeys usually sneak into the temple, and eat the offerings.
这座城市还保留着500多年前的寺庙。
Zhèzuò chéngshì háibǎoliúzhe wǔbǎiduōniánqiánde sìmiào。
A temple more than 500 years old is preserved in the town.

我们要爬上一些台阶才能到达寺庙。
The temple\'s dome was supported by magnificent marble pillars.
寺庙的圆顶由很庄严的大理石柱支撑着。
Several Tibetan temples were destroyed during the Cultural Revolution.
数座西藏寺庙在文革时期被摧毁了。
Marc became a religious in this temple two years ago.
马克两年前在这个寺庙出家了。
Most historic features of the old temple were retained in the renovation.
这次装修保留了古庙的多数历史特点。
He designed a special square structure for this temple.
他为这座庙宇设计了一个特别的方形构造。
This neighbor had many old temples.
这个地区有不少老寺庙。
With the depositing soil, the temple was gradually buried.
沉积下来的土慢慢湮没了这个庙。
He bursts into the temple gun blasting.
Tā xiàng sìmiào kāiqiāng shèjī。
他向寺庙开枪射击。
There are many Hindu temples in this area.
Zhège dìqū yǒu hěnduō yìndù miàoyǔ。
这个地区有很多印度庙宇。
The deity was hidden in the deepest recesses of the temple.
Shén cángzài miàoyǔ bìkān de zuì shēnchù。
神藏在庙宇壁龛的最深处。
The slaves were fluting the pillars of the temples.
Núlìmen zhèngzài miàoyǔ de zhùzi shàng kè āocáo。
奴隶们正在庙宇的柱子上刻凹槽。
The once elegant temple lay in virtual ruin.
Céngjīng zhuāngyán de sìmiào shìshíshàng zhèng chǔyú huǐhuài zhuàngtài。
曾经庄严的寺庙事实上正处于毁坏状态。
These temples were mindlessly destroyed by the red guards.
Zhèxiē sìmiào bèi yúmèiwúzhī de hóngwèibīng dǎohuǐ le。
这些寺庙被愚昧无知的红卫兵捣毁了。

立宪政体
lìxiàn zhèngtǐ 
constitutional government; constitutionalism
宪政。
The political climate was ripe for constitutional reform.
Zhèngzhì fēnwéi hěn shìhé xiànzhèng gǎigé。
政治氛围很适合宪政改革。
The Kingdom of the Netherlands is a hereditary and constitutional monarchy.
Hélán de jūnzhǔ zhèngtǐ shì yì zhǒng shìxí de héhū xiànfǎ de zhèngtǐ zhìdù。
荷兰的君主政体是一种世袭的合乎宪法的政体制度。
The American constitution has provided a pattern for many republics.
Měiguó xiànfǎ wèi gònghé zhèngtǐ tígōngle fànlì。
美国宪法为共和政体提供了范例。
The constitution should not constrain us from articulating these political ideas.
Xiànfǎ bùyīng zǔzhǐ wǒmen shēngzhāng zhèxiē zhèngzhì lǐniàn。
宪法不应阻止我们声张这些政治理念。
联合国宪章
Liánhéguó Xiànzhāng
the United Nations Charter
宪章
Xiànzhāng
charter
联合国宪章。
English democracy had its beginning in the Magna Charta.
英国的民主起源于大宪章。
to invoke an article of the U.N. Charter
援引联合国宪章的条款
Sixteen Council members voted in favour of the revised Charter.
Shíliù gè yìhuì chéngyuán tóupiào zànchéng xiūgǎi xiànzhāng。
十六个议会成员投票赞成修改宪章。
They were restrained by a prohibition in their charter.
Tāmen shòudào qí xiànzhāng zhōng yí xiàng jìnlìng de xiànzhì。
他们受到其宪章中一项禁令的限制。
The president is amenable to the constitutional court.
Zǒngtǒng yào fúcóng xiànfǎ fǎyuàn。
总统要服从宪法法院。
The president is criticizing a federal court ruling that calls his warrantless wiretapping program unconstitutional.
一联邦法院称总统的窃听装置方案是不正当的，总统称该判决是违反宪法。
按照宪法规定的基本原则
ànzhào xiànfǎ guīdìng de jīběnyuánzé 
according to the fundamental principles laid down in the constitution
宪法第三条
Xiànfǎ dì sān tiáo 
Article 3 of the Constitution
宪法是国家的根本法。
Xiànfǎ shì guójiā de gēnběnfǎ。
The Constitution is the fundamental law of the state.
宪法明确规定了公民的权利和义务。
Xiànfǎ míngquè guīdìng le gōngmín de quánlì hé yìwù。
The Constitution clearly defines the rights and duties of citizens.
宪法的前言
xiànfǎ de qiányán
the preamble to a constitution
监督宪法的实施
jiāndū xiànfǎ de shíshī
supervise the enforcement of the constitution

tōngguò xiànfǎ

中华人民共和国宪法
Zhōnghuá Rénmín Gònghéguó Xiànfǎ
the Constitution of the People\'s Republic of China
修改宪法
xiūɡǎi xiànfǎ
amend (or revise) a constitution
制定宪法
zhìdìnɡ xiànfǎ 
draw up a constitution
中华人民共和国宪法总纲
Zhōnghuá Rénmín Gònghéguó Xiànfǎ Zǒnggāng
the General Principles of the Constitution of the People\'s Republic of China
任何现行法都不可以和宪法相悖。
Rènhé xiànxíng fǎ dōu bùkěyǐ hé xiànfǎ xiāngbèi。
No decrees in effect can contradict the constitution.
我们行事要遵奉宪法。
Wǒmen xíngshì yào zūnfèng xiànfǎ。
We should act according to the constitution.
清末的那次维新变法，皇帝曾经想要实施君主立宪制度，但终于没能成功。
Qīngmò de nà cì wéixīn biànfǎ，huángdì céngjīng xiǎngyào shíshī jūnzhǔ lìxiàn zhìdù，dàn zhōng yú méinéng chénggōng。
During the Reform in the last years of the Qing Dynasty, the emperor wanted to implement the constitutional monarchy system but eventually failed.
宪法
遵奉宪法。
颁布宪法
宪法修改草案
宪法对其他一切法律都具有不容违逆的制约力。
the architects of our Constitution
我国宪法的制定者
constitutional rights
宪法规定的权利
It is mentioned sixthly on the constitution.
宪法第六条是这样规定的。
The Constitution of Canada itself recognizes two official languages, English and French.
《加拿大宪法》规定其两种官方语言为英语和法语。
The president is criticizing a federal court ruling that calls his warrantless wiretapping program unconstitutional.
一联邦法院称总统的窃听装置方案是不正当的，总统称该判决是违反宪法。
The constitution is the most essential part of a country\'s legal system.
宪法是一个国家法律体制最基本的部分。
The dictator can not stand the constraint of the constitution any more.
这个独裁者不能再忍受宪法的约束了。
There is a general constitution over these federal states.
这些联邦州都要遵从一个普遍的宪法。
We will always be afflicted with the vices of a political constitution.
我们经常因为宪法的缺陷而遭受折磨。
Elections should then follow for a constituent assembly which would draft a constitution.
Jiēxiàlái yīng jǔxíng guómín dàibiǎo dàhuì xuǎnjǔ，tāmen jiāng qǐcǎo xiànfǎ。
接下来应举行国民代表大会选举，他们将起草宪法。
What powers does the constitution of the United States give to the president?
Měiguó xiànfǎ fùyǔ zǒngtǒng shénmeyàng de quánlì？
美国宪法赋予总统什么样的权利？
The USS Constitution is one of the oldest commissioned naval vessels afloat in the world.
Xiànfǎhào shì shìjiè shàng zuì zǎo tóurù fúyì de hǎijūn jiàntǐng zhīyī。
宪法号是世界上最早投入服役的海军舰艇之一。
They got in a tilt over the question of constitutional rights.
Tāmen zài xiànfǎ quánlì wèntí shàng zhēnglùn qǐlái le。
他们在宪法权利问题上争论起来了。
He swore allegiance to the new Constitution in a solemn ceremony before the Congress.
Zài yìhuì miànqián tā zài yí gè lóngzhòng de yíshì shàng xuānshì yōnghù xīnxiànfǎ。
在议会面前他在一个隆重的仪式上宣誓拥护新宪法。
The Kingdom of the Netherlands is a hereditary and constitutional monarchy.
Hélán de jūnzhǔ zhèngtǐ shì yì zhǒng shìxí de héhū xiànfǎ de zhèngtǐ zhìdù。
荷兰的君主政体是一种世袭的合乎宪法的政体制度。
The constitution should not constrain us from articulating these political ideas.
Xiànfǎ bùyīng zǔzhǐ wǒmen shēngzhāng zhèxiē zhèngzhì lǐniàn。
宪法不应阻止我们声张这些政治理念。
The new Irish constitution was going against the spirit of this approach.
Xīn Ài\'ěrlán xiànfǎ duì zhè yī shǒuduàn de jīngshen bèidào\'érchí。
新爱尔兰宪法对这一手段的精神背道而驰。
The American constitution has provided a pattern for many republics.
Měiguó xiànfǎ wèi gònghé zhèngtǐ tígōngle fànlì。
美国宪法为共和政体提供了范例。
The new constitution mocks all democratic principles.
Xīnxiànfǎ shì duì suǒyǒu mínzhǔ yuánzé de cháonòng。
新宪法是对所有民主原则的嘲弄。
The constitution provides for the right to free speech.
Xiànfǎ guīdìngle yánlùnzìyóu de quánlì。
宪法规定了言论自由的权利。
The nickname for the U.S. constitution is &quot;old ironsides&quot;.
Měiguó xiànfǎhào jūnjiàn de nìchēng shì“lǎo tiěpí jiàn”（old ironsides）。
美国宪法号军舰的昵称是“老铁皮舰”（old ironsides）。
A clause in the U.S. constitution prevents sitting legislators from receiving emoluments from their own votes.
Měiguó xiànfǎ zhōng de yí xiàng tiáokuǎn guīdìng，jìnzhǐ zàirèn de lìfǎ wěiyuán cóng zìjǐ de xuǎnpiào zhōng shōuqǔ bàochóu。
美国宪法中的一项条款规定，禁止在任的立法委员从自己的选票中收取报酬。
The united states constitution declares itself to be &quot;the supreme law of the land&quot;.
Měiguó xiànfǎ xuānchēng zìjǐ shì“Měiguó zuìgāo fǎlǜ”。
美国宪法宣称自己是 “美国最高法律”。
In 1920 the 18th amendment to the constitution established prohibition in the us.
Měiguó 1920 nián shí duì xiànfǎ de dì 18 cì xiūdìng bānbùle jìnjiǔlìng。
美国1920年时对宪法的第18次修订颁布了禁酒令。
A woman\'s right to an abortion was constitutionalized in the 1970\'s.
Fùnǚ duòtāi de quánlì zài èrshí shìjì qīshíniándài bèi xiě jìnle xiànfǎ。
妇女堕胎的权利在二十世纪七十年代被写进了宪法。
A good way of exercising is to constitutionalize.
Hǎo de shíshī bànfǎ jiùshì shǐ zhī xiànfǎhuà。
好的实施办法就是使之宪法化。
The United States were constitutionalized in the late 18th century.
Měiguó zài shíbā shìjì wǎnqī biànchéng yí gè xiànfǎhuà guójiā。
美国在18世纪晚期变成一个宪法化国家。
The president is amenable to the constitutional court.
Zǒngtǒng yào fúcóng xiànfǎ fǎyuàn。
总统要服从宪法法院。
He claimed a violation of his rights under the fifth amendment.
Tā shēngchēng tā zài xiànfǎ dì-wǔ xiūzhèng\'àn xià de quánlì shòudàole qīnfàn。
他声称他在宪法第五修正案下的权利受到了侵犯。
This was constitutionally ruled out.
Gēnjù xiànfǎ，zhè bèi páichú zàiwài。

Steel is made from iron.
战争把他磨炼成一条铁汉。
炼句
liànjù
try to find the best turn of phrase; polish and repolish a sentence
我们的作文要炼字炼句，以求文辞精练顺达。
Wǒmen de zuòwén yào liànzì liànjù，yǐqiú wéncí jīngliàn shùndá。
When we write a composition, we should try to find the exact words and sentences to make the diction proficient, smooth, and effectual.
锤炼词句
chuíliàn cíjù 
polish a piece of writing
炼句。
锻字炼句。
琢句炼字。
字句精炼。
相传这里曾有位术士能炼长生不老金丹。
Xiāngchuán zhèlǐ céng yǒu wèi shùshì néng liàn chángshēng bùlǎo jīndān。
The legend goes that there was a magician who could produce elixir.
The Alchemist is my favorite novel.
《炼金术士》是我最喜欢的小说。
Magicians and alchemists have been trying to change base metal into gold for centuries.
Wūshī hé liàn jīn shùshì jǐgè shìjì yǐlái yìzhí zài shìtú jiāng jīběn jīnshǔ biànwéi huángjīn。
巫师和炼金术士几个世纪以来一直在试图将基本金属变为黄金。
The alchemists tried to turn lead into gold.
Liànjīnshùshì qǐtú bǎ qiān biànchéng jīnzi。
炼金术士企图把铅变成金子。
The alchemists were unable to accept the inconvertible nature of elemental metals.
Liànjīnshùshì wúfǎ jiēshòu jīnshǔyuánsù de shǔxìng bùnéng gǎibiàn zhè yī shìshí。
炼金术士无法接受金属元素的属性不能改变这一事实。

Religion had an intimate association with alchemy during the Middle Ages.
在中世纪, 宗教和炼金术密切相联。
The Alchemist is my favorite novel.
《炼金术士》是我最喜欢的小说。

炼焦
liànjiāo
make coke; coke
炼焦。
炼制煤焦油。
Walking past the factory at night is beautiful although you can sometimes smell the burn of the refinery.
虽然有时会闻到提炼厂的焦糊味，但是晚上穿过工厂的感觉真的很不错。
Petroleum coke is a fuel produced using the byproducts of the petroleum refining process.
石油焦炭是一种燃料，是由石油提炼过程中的副产品加工而成的。
This exercise will strengthen your upper body.
Zhè xiàng duànliàn nénggòu qiánghuà nín de shàngshēn。
这项锻炼能够强化您的上身。
我到钢厂劳动了一段时间，对炼钢摸着点门儿了。
Wǒ dào gāngchǎngláodòng le yíduàn shíjiān，duì liàngāngmōzháo diǎn ménr le。
After working in the steel mill for a while I got an inkling of how steel is made.
Three steel factories will be settled within the extent of the north district of the city.
三座炼钢厂将被建在市区北部。

在大江大海中游泳，既可以锻炼身体，又可以锻炼意志。
Zài dàjiāng dàhǎi zhōng yóuyǒng，jì kěyǐ duànliàn shēntǐ，yòu kěyǐ duànliàn yìzhì。
Swimming in big rivers and seas helps to build up both physical strength and willpower.
你应该多锻炼锻炼了，才干了这么点力气活就抽气得不行。
Nǐ yīnggāi duō duànliàn duànliàn le，cái gàn le zhème diǎn lìqìhuó jiù chōuqì de bùxíng。
You should exercise more, you\'ve already out of breath after completing such a small task.

Generally those who exercise regularly have high resistance to disease.

láodònɡ duànliàn

Bùguǎn tiān duōme lěng，tā dōu jiānchí hùwài duànliàn。

他锻炼身体一向很积极。
Tā duànliàn shēntǐ yí xiàng hěn jījí。
He has always been very keen on doing physical exercises.
他坚持锻炼，几年来从不间断。

He has kept up physical training for several years without interruption.

xiānqǐ qúnzhòngxìng tǐyù duànliàn de rècháo
unfold a vigorous mass campaign for sports and physical training

shǎnsù róngliàn

cóngkuàngshí zhōng tíliàn jīnshǔ

Běnshi búshì tiānshēng de，shì duànliàn chūlái de。

他这才知道锻炼身体的好处。
Tā zhè cái zhīdào duànliàn shēntǐ de hǎochu。

liànrǔ

我新学了一套棒操锻炼身体。
Wǒ xīn xué le yítào bàngcāo duànliàn shēntǐ。
I\'ve just learned how to exercise with clubs.
我爷爷每天都拿着保健球锻炼。
Wǒ yéye měitiān dōu ná zhe bǎojiànqiú duànliàn。
My grandfather exercises with his healthcare balls every day.
他要静心修炼，闭关49天。
Tā yào jìngxīn xiūliàn，bìguān sìshíjiǔtiān。
He will stay secluded for 49 days to cultivate himself.
大麻油是从大麻籽中提炼出来的。
Dàmáyóu shì cóng dàmázǐ zhōng tíliàn chūlái de。
Hempseed oil is extracted from hempseeds.
部队是一个锻炼意志的大熔炉。
Bùduì shì yígè duànliàn yìzhì de dàrónglú。
The army is a place where people can build their character.
丹砂是炼汞最主要的矿物原料。
Dānshā shì liàngǒng zuì zhǔyào de kuàngwù yuánliào。
Cinnabar is the main mineral material for polishing mercury.
经常锻炼身体，能够提高人体的抵抗力。
Jīngcháng duànliàn shēntǐ，nénggòu tígāo réntǐ de dǐkànglì。
Regular physical exercises can strengthen one\'s resistance against illness.
他每天都定时进行长跑锻炼。
Tā měitiān dōu dìngshí jìnxíng chángpǎo duànliàn。
He goes for a long-distance run every day at a specific time.
他常年坚持锻炼，冬练三九，夏练三伏。
Tā chángnián jiānchí duànliàn,dōng liàn sānjiǔ,xià liàn sānfú.
He keeps exercising all year around, even in the hottest days in summer and the coldest days in winter.
这篇文章语言繁芜，最好能再精炼一下。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng yǔyán fánwú，zuì hǎo néng zài jīngliàn yíxià。
This article is too wordy, it needs revision.
仰卧起坐是锻炼腹部肌肉的有效办法。
Yǎngwò qǐzuò shì duànliàn fùbùjīròu de yǒuxiào bànfǎ。
Doing sit-ups is an effective way to exercise abdominal muscles.
相传这里曾有位术士能炼长生不老金丹。
Xiāngchuán zhèlǐ céng yǒu wèi shùshì néng liàn chángshēng bùlǎo jīndān。
The legend goes that there was a magician who could produce elixir.
早上在公园锻炼的老头儿特别的多。
Zǎoshàng zài gōngyuán duànliàn de lǎotóur tèbié de duō。
In morning, there are a lot of old men doing exercise in the park.
他们正在炼山，准备来年植树造林。
Tāmen zhèngzài liànshān，zhǔnbèi láinián zhíshù zàolín。
They are clearing the mountain to prepare for the tree planting, and forestation next year.
炼狱是个宗教词汇，是洗脱人罪过的地方。
Liànyù shì gè zōngjiào cíhuì，shì xǐtuō rén zuìguò de dìfāng。
Purgatory is a religious word which is a place for people to wash away their sins.
他的这次经历犹如炼狱一般，饱受熬煎。
Tā de zhècì jīnglì yóurú liànyù yìbān，bǎoshòu áojiān。
His experience this time was like going through  prugatory, he had suffered a lot.
他的这篇文章写得十分凝炼简洁。
Tā de zhèpiān wénzhāng xiě de shífēn níngliàn jiǎnjié。
The language of this article is concise and succinct.
在小公司里当个总经理，比在大公司里当部门经理更能锻炼人的管理才能，所以他“宁为鸡口，无为牛后”。
Zài xiǎo gōngsī lǐ dāng gè zǒngjīnglǐ，bǐ zài dà gōngsī lǐ dāng bùmén jīnglǐ gèng néng duànliàn rén de guǎnlǐ cáinéng，suǒyǐ tā“níngwéi jīkǒu，wúwéi niúhòu”。
A person\'s managerial ability will improve more as a general manager of a small company than as a department manager in a big one. He therefore chose to be the beak of a chicken than the rump of an ox.
你们这个冶炼厂一天能够熔冶出多少铜来？
Nǐmen zhège yěliànchǎng yìtiān nénggòu róngyě chū duōshǎo tóng lái？
How much copper can your smelting factory smelt in a day?
这种药剂是用蛇胆提炼而成的。
Zhèzhǒng yàojì shì yòng shédǎn tíliànérchéng de。
This medicine was extracted from the gallbladder of snakes.
我们要不断地培养自己的思辨能力、锻炼思辨性思维。
Wǒmen yào búduàn de péiyǎng zìjǐ de sībiàn nénglì、duànliàn sībiànxìng sīwéi。
We should keep on developing our ability to think logically and exercise speculative thinking.
这孩子从小就体弱多病，这都是缺乏体育锻炼造成的。
Zhè háizi cóng xiǎo jiù tǐruò duōbìng，zhè dōushì quēfá tǐyù duànliàn zàochéng de。
The child has a weak constitution and is struck ill from time to time. Lack of exercise is part of the reason.
老年人年老体衰更应该参加一些适当的体育锻炼。
Lǎoniánrén niánlǎo tǐshuāi gèng yīnggāi cānjiā yìxiē shìdàng de tǐyù duànliàn。
Elderly people are worn with age, so it is even more important for them to take part in exercise.
由于长期坚持体育锻炼，他看起来鹤发童颜。
Yóuyú chángqī jiānchí tǐyù duànliàn，tā kànqǐlái hèfātóngyán。
Thanks to his persistent physical exercise, he looks healthy, with white hair and a ruddy complexion.
运动员们正在锻炼，以便加强腿部肌肉的力量。
Yùndòngyuánmen zhèngzài duànliàn，yǐ biàn jiāqiáng tuǐbùjīròu de lìliang。
The sportsmen are exercising to improve the strength of the muscles on their legs.
小强在岁月的洗炼中不断成长，不断成熟。
Xiǎo Qiáng zài suìyuè de xǐliàn zhōng búduàn chéngcháng，búduàn chéngshú。
Xiao Qiang is growing more and more mature with the trials of time.
在中国神话里，太上老君专职修炼仙丹。
Zài Zhōngguó shénhuà lǐ，tàishànglǎojūn zhuānzhí xiūliàn xiāndān。
In Chinese Mythology, Laojun was in charge of alchemy.
这支军队百炼成钢。
Zhèzhī jūnduì bǎiliànchénggāng。
This army has been toughened up by its experience.
锤炼意志
chuíliànyìzhì
harden one\'s resolve
锤炼孩子的思考力
chuíliàn háizǐde sīkǎolì
sharpen a child\'s powers of thought
锤炼写作技巧
chuíliàn xiězuòjìqiǎo
refine one\'s writing skills
工作很忙，但是她还坚持锻炼。
Gōngzuò hěnmáng，dànshì tā hái jiānchí duànliàn。
She was very busy at work, but she managed to stick to her exercise regime.
我们应该坚持锻炼以增强对疾病的抵抗力。
Wǒmen yīnggāi jiānchíduànliàn yǐ zēngqiáng duì jíbìngde dǐkànglì。
We should take exercise to build up resistance to disease.
艰苦的环境锻炼人的意志。
Jiānkǔde huánjìng duànliàn rénde yìzhì。
People are toughened by difficult experiences.
不管天气多么寒冷，我们都要坚持锻炼。
Bùguǎn tiānqì duōmehánlěng，wǒmen dōuyào jiānchí duànliàn。
No matter how cold it gets, we must all stick to our exercise routine.
她把锻炼的时间固定在星期六下午。
Tā bǎ duànliànde shíjiān gùdìngzài xīngqīliùxiàwǔ。
She fixed the exercise time for Saturday afternoons.
你应该坚持锻炼身体。
Nǐ yīnggāi jiānchí duànliàn shēntǐ.
You should go on taking exercise.
石油炼制
shíyóu liànzhì 
petroleum refining
炼钢炉
liàngānglú
steel-making furnace

锻炼时别过度！
Walking is a healthy form of exercise.
Xíngzǒu shì yì zhǒng yǒuyì jiànkāng de duànliàn fāngshì。
行走是一种有益健康的锻炼方式。
He did some exercising.
Tā zuòle yìxiē duànliàn。
他做了一些锻炼。
The physical exertion required by his work kept him fit.
Tā de gōngzuò suǒ yāoqiú de shēntǐ duànliàn shǐ tā bǎochízhe qiángjiàn de tǐgé。
他的工作所要求的身体锻炼使他保持着强健的体格。
火法精炼
huǒfǎ jīnɡliàn
fire refining
真空精炼
zhēnkōngjīngliàn
vacuum refining
这篇文章语言繁芜，最好能再精炼一下。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng yǔyán fánwú，zuì hǎo néng zài jīngliàn yíxià。
This article is too wordy, it needs revision.
我们的作文要炼字炼句，以求文辞精练顺达。
Wǒmen de zuòwén yào liànzì liànjù，yǐqiú wéncí jīngliàn shùndá。
When we write a composition, we should try to find the exact words and sentences to make the diction proficient, smooth, and effectual.
改稿比原稿精炼。
精炼原油。
文字精炼
内容精炼。
字句精炼。
精心锤炼
此人老奸巨猾，修炼成精，很难对付
China has about eight factories to refine the ore.
Zhōngguó yǒu dàyuē bā jiā jīngliàn kuàngshí de qǐyè。
中国有大约八家精炼矿石的企业。
He was a sugar refiner.
Tā shì yí wèi báitáng jīngliànzhě。
他是一位白糖精炼者。
Horses need to exercise each day, for both their physical and psychological welfare.
Wèile shēntǐsùzhì jí jīngqìshén，mǎ měitiān xūyào duànliàn。
为了身体素质及精气神，马每天需要锻炼。
Exercise helped him get the alcohol out of his system.
Duànliàn bāngzhù tā ràng zìjǐ de shēntǐ jièchúle duì jiǔjīng de yīlài。
锻炼帮助他让自己的身体戒除了对酒精的依赖。
这支军队百炼成钢。
Zhèzhī jūnduì bǎiliànchénggāng。
This army has been toughened up by its experience.

The pavement was packed with jostling crowds.

As a traitor and usurper who sought to murder the sovereign and betray his country, he should be killed as soon as possible.
他是位曾经领兵平叛的国家功臣。
Tā shì wèi céngjīng lǐngbīng píngpàn de guójiā gōngchén。
He is a national official of merit who once led the army and put down a rebellion.
背叛祖国
bèipàn zǔguó
betray one\'s country
叛卖祖国
pànmài zǔɡuó
betray one\'s country
对于背叛自己国家的犹大们，我们决不能手软。
Duìyú bèipàn zìjǐ guójiā de yóudàmén，wǒmen juébùnéng shǒuruǎn。
We will never be soft-hearted to people that betray their own country.
回国之后他就变了心，背叛了女友。
Huíguó zhīhòu tā jiù biànlexīn，bèipànle nǚyǒu。
After coming back from abroad he ditched his girlfriend.
他们对国家效死尽忠，发誓决不当叛徒。
Tāmen duì guójiā xiàosǐ jìn zhōng，fāshì jué bùdāng pàntú。

Rebellion was intrinsic to the growth of state power up to the nineteenth century.

The scientists defected to the Allied Powers.
科学家们叛逃到了盟国。
The spy betrayed his country.

这名间谍背叛了他的祖国。

那些叛徒的头会被国王砍掉。
They defected because russian dance was in a straitjacket.
Tāmen pàntáo shì yīnwèi éguó de wǔdǎoyìshù bèishòu xiànzhì hé shùfù。
他们叛逃是因为俄国的舞蹈艺术备受限制和束缚。

England still expects a modicum of eccentricity in its artists.

英国仍期待出现少数离经叛道的艺术家。

An offline registration is not possible.

离线注册是不可能的。
We have over 1,000 new applicants register every week!

我们每个星期都有超过1,000名新申请者进行注册。
Students entering an advanced course of study are normally required to register before the deadline.

你可以轻松地免费注册，从该网站获取时事通讯或者下载音频节目。
We are registered in the UK with the Data Protection Act.

有了攉煤机，再也不用人一铲子一铲子地挖煤了。
Yǒu le huōméijī，zài yě búyòng rén yìchǎnzi yìchǎnzi de wāméi le。
With coal shovel machines, people don\'t have to dig out coal shovel by shovel.
采访记要要注意挖掘生活中的一些细节，让事实说话。
Cǎifǎng jìyào yào zhùyì wājué shēnghuó zhōng de yìxiē xìjié，ràng shìshí shuōhuà。
Pay attention to digging out details when interviewing important people, let facts speak for themselves.
春天的时候，我们在山上挖了许多坑子，种下了许多树苗。
Chūntiān de shíhou，wǒmen zài shān shàng wā le xǔduō kēngzi，zhòngxià le xǔduō shùmiáo。
In spring, we dug many holes on the mountain and planted saplings.
我们不能只停留在表面问题的分析，那可能会走向误区，而是要挖掘里层规律性的东西。
Wǒmen bùnéng zhǐ tíngliú zài biǎomiàn wèntí de fēnxī，nà kěnéng huì zǒu xiàng wùqū，érshì yào wājué lǐcéng guīlǜxìng de dōngxi。
We can\'t only analyze the surface of the problems, which may mislead us. Instead, we should dig into the underlying principles.
他总是贫嘴薄舌地挖苦人家，人家怎能高兴呢？
Tā zǒngshì pínzuǐ bóshé de wākǔ rénjia，rénjia zěnnéng gāoxìng ne？
He is always annoyingly garrulous and sharp-tongued towards everyone, how could anyone be happy?
清挖河道是为了保持河道畅通，河水清洁。
Qīngwā hédào shì wèi le bǎochí hédào chàngtōng，héshuǐ qīngjié。
Dredging the river aims at keeping the river course smooth and water clean.
我打算在院子里挖一口渗井。
Wǒ dǎsuàn zài yuànzi lǐ wā yìkǒu shènjǐng。
I intend to dig a seepage pit in the courtyard.

暴徒们砸烂了警察岗亭，把警车付之一炬，并洗劫了这些大楼。
This stolen taxi was abandoned after the hijack.
Zài shíshī qiǎngjié hòu，zhè liàng tōu lái de chūzūchē bèi diūqì le。
在实施抢劫后，这辆偷来的出租车被丢弃了。
一场惨绝人寰的浩劫
yìcháng cǎnjuérénhuán de hàojié 
a holocaust tragic beyond compare
一伙武装匪徒断路拦劫旅客的钱财。
Yì huǒ wǔzhuāng fěitú duànlù lánjié lǚkè de qiáncái。
A band of armed bandits held up the passengers and took all their money.
劫法场
jié fǎchǎng
raid an execution ground to rescue the condemned
一起抢劫案竟在光天化日之下发生在一条热闹大街上。
Yì qǐ qiǎngjié\'àn jìngzài guāngtiānhuàrì zhī xià fāshēngzài yìtiáo rènào dàjiē shàng。
A holdup took place in broad daylight in a crowded street.
空前浩劫
kōngqián hàojié
an unheard-of calamity
劫持飞机(船舰)
jiéchí fēijī(chuánjiàn) 
hijack an aeroplane (a ship, a train, a motor vehicle)
劫持者
jiéchízhě 
hijacker
他被劫道了。
Tā bèi jié dào le。
He was waylaid by bandits. or He was mugged.
他是个作案多起的劫匪。
Tā shì gè zuò\'àn duō qǐ de jiéfěi。
He is a highwayman of many crimes.
屡遭劫难
lǚ zāo jiénàn 
have experienced many disasters
他是聚众劫狱的首要分子。
Tā shì jùzhòngjiéyù de shǒuyào fènzǐ。
He is the ringleader in the prison raid.
拦路抢劫
lánlù qiǎngjié
waylay; hold up
有四个人今天早上抢劫了银行。
Yǒu sì gè rén jīntiān zǎoshàngqiǎngjié le yínháng。
Four men robbed the bank this morning.
把商店抢劫一空
bǎ shāngdiàn qiǎngjiéyìkōng
ransack a store
陷于万劫不复之地
xiànyú wànjiébúfù zhī dì 
be doomed forever
屋子里的东西被匪徒们洗劫一空。
Wūzi lǐ de dōngxi bèi fěitúmen xǐjiéyìkōng。
The bandits made off with everything in the house.
持械抢劫
chíxiè qiǎngjié
(commit) armed robbery
打劫
dǎjié
rob; plunder; loot
劫持
jiéchí
kidnap; hold under duress; hijack
浩劫
hàojié
great calamity; catastrophe
他躲进了柴堆，才逃过这一劫。
Tā duǒjìn le cháiduī，cái táoguò zhè yì jié。
He escaped misfortune by hiding in the woodpile.
警察叱令劫匪放下手中的枪。
Jǐngchá chìlìng jiéfěi fàngxià shǒu zhōng de qiāng。
Police yelled at the robbers, ordering them to put down their guns.
那幅名贵字画被盗劫了。
Nà fú míngguì zìhuà bèi dàojié le。
That rare work of calligraphy and painting has been stolen.
警方施放了毒气弹，把劫匪逼出了屋子。
Jǐngfāng shīfàng le dúqìdàn，bǎ jiéfěi bī chū le wūzi。
The police used poisonous gas to force the robbers out of the house.
公安部门用了两天时间就把这起劫案破了。
Gōngān bùmén yòng le liǎngtiān shíjiān jiù bǎ zhè qǐ jiéàn pò le。
The police solved the robbery case in two days.

Zhèxiē cǎokòu dàsì jiédào xíngrén de cáiwù。
These bandits boldly rob passers-by of their belongings.
与本案相关的劫盗已全部落网。

The robbers involved in the case have all been arrested.
昨晚，一位的哥被两名男子劫杀了。

Last night, a taxi driver was robbed and killed by two men.

The police began to investigate the robbery case.
这股顽匪已被劫灭净尽，再不能祸害百姓了。

The ganstershave been eliminated and can no longer harm the people.
他已经在这座山上作了两年山大王，干了很多抢劫的坏事。

He has been the head of a group of outlaws on this mountain for two years, and has robbed others many times.
这次你能逃出大劫全靠先世积下的阴德。
Zhècì nǐ néng táochū dàjié quánkào xiānshì jīxià de yīndé。
You are able to avert danger because of the virtues of your ancestors.

Robbing from a fast car has been one of the most common means of robbery in recent days.
因为未带机票而躲过一劫，真是幸甚。

循例你是要坐牢的，算你幸运，遇到贵人了，可以躲过此劫。

bǎohédiǎn 
saturation point

Dāng shídòng zhōng de yánshuǐ róngyè bǎohé yǐhòu，yánjīng jiù kāishǐ xíngchéng。
当石洞中的盐水溶液饱和以后，盐晶就开始形成。
The clayey soil was heavy and easily saturated.

粘土太重，易于饱和。

He always greeted me with a new zinger.

比萨饼和汉堡包把孩子们填饱了。

饱和点
bǎohédiǎn 
saturation point
相对湿度为百分之百时空气即呈饱和。
Xiāngduì shīdù wéi bǎifēnzhībǎi shí kōngqì jí chéng bǎohé。
When the relative humidity reaches 100 per cent the air is saturated.
她一生饱经沧桑。

bǎojīngfēngshuāng de miànróng

Zhànzhēng niándài，rénmín bǎoshòu kǔnán，biàndì āihóng。
The people suffered greatly during war time. Everywhere one went there were refugees groaning in pain.

Jīnnián de bāogǔ zǐlì bǎomǎn。
This year\'s corn is of high quality.
当众打饱嗝儿是不礼貌的。
Dāngzhòng dǎ bǎogér shì bùlǐmào de。

五天的行程，我们饱览了当地民族风情。

During the five-day journey, we had a full taste of the local culture and customs.

Rénmín de bǎonuǎn guānxì zhe guójiā de wèilái。
The quality of life of the people has a direct bearing on the future of a nation.
饱食终日，无所用心的日子其实是很难过的。
Bǎoshí zhōngrì，wúsuǒ yòngxīn de rìzi qíshí shì hěnnánguò de。
Idling away one\'s time brings nothing except boredom.
饱受病痛煎熬的那段日子让她终生难忘。
Bǎoshòu bìngtòng jiān\'áo de nàduàn rìzi ràng tā zhōngshēng nánwàng。
She can never forget the time when she was suffering from disease.
她一受委屈就对她的玩具娃娃饱以老拳。

Whenever she feels wronged by others, she punches her doll, taking out her anger on it.
我实在是吃不下了，肚子已经很饱胀了。

I\'m full, I can\'t eat any more.
这次的恐龙化石展览，真是让我们大饱眼福。

The exhibition of dinosaur fossils was a real treat for us.
看着这些饱满的稻穗，我真是高兴！
Kàn zhe zhèxiē bǎomǎn de dàosuì，wǒ zhēnshì gāoxīng！
I am really glad to see these full spikes of rice!
当妈妈的总是挂牵着自己孩子的冷暖饥饱。

The mother is always worrying about the daily life of her child.
他是光棍儿一条，一人吃饱全家不饿。

This pignut is big and full.

He said he was full. In other words, he didn\'t want to have more.
现在生活水平提高了，不仅是解决饥饱那么简单，还要吃得有营养。
Xiànzài shēnghuó shuǐpíng tígāo le，bùjǐn shì jiějué jībǎo nàme jiǎndān，háiyào chī de yǒu yíngyǎng。
Now our living standard has been raised, we should take in enough nutrition besides eating enough food.
从小没有吃过饱饭的苦味实在是难以忘记啊！
Cóng xiǎo méiyǒu chīguò bǎofàn de kǔwèi shízai shì nányǐ wàngjì a！
I was never full when I was young, and that bitter memory is unforgettable.
他饱受苦刑却依然没有讲出我军的秘密。
Tā bǎoshòu kǔxíng què yīrán méiyǒu jiǎngchū wǒ jūn de mìmì。
He still kept the army\'s secret, though he suffered cruel torture.
他的这次经历犹如炼狱一般，饱受熬煎。

His experience this time was like going through  prugatory, he had suffered a lot.

The grains of wheat are plump this year.

Tā qiántíng bǎomǎn，kànshàngqù jiù hěncōngmíng。
With a prominent forehead, he looks smart.
今天能够享用如此盛馔，真是大饱口福呀！

他的天庭十分饱满，一看便知是有福之相。
Tā de tiāntíng shífēn bǎomǎn，yíkàn biànzhī shì yǒufú zhī xiàng。

这个国家还有好多老百姓在温饱线以下挣扎。

Many people live under the poverty line in this country.
蚁蚕天天不停地吃着桑叶，吃饱了就等着褪皮长大。
Yǐcán tiāntiān bùtíng de chī zhe sāng yè，chībǎo le jiù děng zhe tuìpí zhǎngdà。
Newly-hatched silkworms eat mulberry leaves every day; when they are full, they just wait to shed their skin and grow up.
身为执法人员，更不应该利用职务之便中饱私囊了。

饱餐
He subjected himself to a poor diet.
他饱受粗茶淡饭之苦。
They subjected him to heat in the wilderness.
他们使得他在野外饱受烈日暴晒之苦。
He subjected himself to criticism.
他饱受责难。
His skin was rough and weather beaten from years of working the land under harsh conditions.
长年在环境恶劣的土地上工作，他的皮肤因饱经风霜而变得很粗糙。
I don\'t want to eat anymore because I am full.
我不想吃了，饱了。
I was already full by the second course.
我吃完第二道菜后就已经饱了。
You shouldn\'t use inside information to feather your own nest.

féngbǔ yīfu

yònghuī bǎ qiángfènghúshàng

在窗帘上缝几个环儿。
Zài chuānglián shàngféngjǐgè huánr。
Sew a few rings on the curtain.
那个裁缝的手工很精。
Nàge cáifeng de shǒugōng hěn jīng。
That tailor does skilful work.
别门缝里看人，把人家给看扁了。
Bié ménfènglǐ kànrén，bǎ rénjia gěi kànbiǎn le。
Don\'t look at people with a jaundiced eye and make little of them!
把掉在缝里的豆粒抠出来
bǎ diào zài fènglǐ de dòulì kōuchūlái
dig out the beans from the crevices
墙上裂缝了。
Qiángshàng lièfèng le。
The wall has cracked.
墙上有一道裂缝。
Qiáng shàng yǒu yídào lièfèng。
There is a crack in the wall.
壶底有道漏缝。
Hú dǐ yǒu dào lòufèng。
There is a crack in the bottom of the kettle.
他不说话，只是眯缝着眼睛笑。
Tā bùshuōhuà，zhǐshì mīfeng zhe yǎnjingxiào。
He didn\'t say anything, but only narrowed his eyes into a smile.
在单据的骑缝上盖印
zài dānjù de qífèngshànggài yìn
put a seal across the perforation between the two halves of a voucher
弥缝缺漏
míféng quēlòu
fill in gaps and supply omissions
缝纫机踏板
féngrènjī tàbǎn
the treadle of a sewing machine
这篇文章，论证严密天衣无缝。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng，lùnzhèngyánmì tiānyīwúfèng。
The article is close-knit and its argument flawless.
无缝钢管厂
wúfènggāngguǎnchǎng

剔牙缝
tī yáfèng

缝纫机轧轧地响着。
féngrènjī yaya de xiǎng zhe。
The sewing machine was clicking away.
把纸条从门缝里掖进去
bǎ zhǐtiáo cóng ménfènglǐ yējìnqù
slip a note under the door

Zhètái féngrènjī gāngmǎilái de shíhou bùhǎo yòng，xiàn zài yǐjing yòngchūlái le。

féngrènzhēn

bǎ zhēnjiǎo féng de mìyìxiē。

弥缝
míféng

缝纫
féngrèn
sewing; tailoring
这件衣裳缝个按扣儿最合适了。
Zhèjiàn yīshang féng gè ànkòur zuì héshì le。
A few press buttons would be great for this shirt.

Wǒ xiǎng mǎi yìtái bāofèngjī。

She made these baby clothes with her own hands for her little child.

The tailor’s wonderful skills attracted a lot of customers.
这次沉船的原因是在船底出现了一个很大的裂缝。

A huge crack at the bottom of the ship caused the shipwreck.

这件衣服是妈妈亲手为宝宝缝制的。

This baby dress was made by the mother herself.

Zuǒyòu gōuquán jiāotìshǐyòng，zhídào hàipà de cáifeng diēdǎo zài dì。
左右钩拳交替使用，直到害怕的裁缝跌倒在地。
Several colored patches were sewn neatly round the seat of his pants.
Jǐ gè cǎisè bǔding bèi zhěngqí de fèng zài tā kùzi dìng bù。
几个彩色补丁被整齐地缝在他裤子腚部。
I sat there sewing instead of rehearsing which I needed.
Běnlái wǒ xūyào páiliàn，wǒ què zuòzài nà féngbǔ（yīfu）。
本来我需要排练，我却坐在那缝补（衣服）。
He\'d even sit at a machine in the factory sewing patchwork cushions with all the remnants.
Tā shènzhì zuòzài gōngchǎng de jīqì shàng yòng suǒyǒu língtóu bù fèng diànzǐ。
他甚至坐在工厂的机器上用所有零头布缝垫子。
She set the sewing machine to the longest stitch possible.
Tā jiāng féngrènjī diào dào kěnéng de zuìcháng zhēnjiǎo。
她将缝纫机调到可能的最长针脚。
She found a cushion hanging in front of her place, sewn in neat wool stitches.
Tā fāxiàn zài tā de wèizhi qián yǒu yí gè diànzǐ，diànzǐ shì yóu xìxì de yángmáo xiàn zhēnjiǎo féngzhì de。
她发现在她的位置前有一个垫子，垫子是由细细的羊毛线针脚缝制的。
The woman used long needles to stitch her son\'s trousers together.
Zhè wèi fùnǚ yòng chángzhēn fénghǎole tā érzi de kùjiǎo。
这位妇女用长针缝好了她儿子的裤脚。
It would not be dignified to remove his trousers in front of the tailor.
Zài cáifeng miànqián tuōdiào kùzi yǒushī tǐmiàn。
在裁缝面前脱掉裤子有失体面。

在混凝土上勾缝比在软性砖或石头上更难。

The tailor was binding off stitches in her shop.

这个女孩把手举起放进头发里，恨不得找个地缝钻进去。

There is a crack in the hull，but there isn\'t any water leaking in.

青翠的西山
qīngcuì de xīshān
the verdant green Western Hills (in Beijing)
雨后，垂柳显得格外青翠。
Yǔ hòu，chuíliǔ xiǎnde géwài qīngcuì。
The weeping willows looked fresher and greener after the rain.
此地青山掩映，苍翠欲滴。
Cǐdì qīngshān yǎnyìng，cāngcuì yùdī。
There are many green mountains in this area, everywhere you see is green.
他高尚的品格好比苍松翠柏，万古长青。
Tā gāoshàng de pǐngé hǎobǐcāngsōng cuìbǎi，wàngǔchángqīng。
Like pines and cypresses, his qualities are forever great.
朝阳的辉光照耀着青翠的群山。
青翠欲滴。
春雨过后，院子里的花草益发青翠可爱。
青山翠竹倒映在碧水之中。
安葬在青松翠柏之间。
楼台亭阁掩映在青松翠柏之中。
There, beyond the mountain, there is a big green valley.
在山的那边有一个青翠的大山谷。
站在这里向远山看去，是一片滴翠的绿色。
Zhànzài zhèlǐ xiàng yuǎnshān kànqù，shì yípiàn dīcuì de lǜsè。
Looking at the distant mountain from here, one can see a stretch of vivid green.
此地青山掩映，苍翠欲滴。
Cǐdì qīngshān yǎnyìng，cāngcuì yùdī。
There are many green mountains in this area, everywhere you see is green.
雨后初晴，群山滴翠。
青翠欲滴。

这个翡翠绿莹莹的，成色极好！

This glittering green emerald is of high purity.

苍松翠柏，常绿不凋。

一条翠绿色的蜥蜴爬到太阳底下。
The tree\'s leaves are bright green, long, and taper to a point at both ends.

层峦叠翠
céngluán diécuì

cōngcuì de zhúlin

cuìlán de tiānkōng

the verdant green Western Hills (in Beijing)

Yǔ hòu，chuíliǔ xiǎnde géwài qīngcuì。
The weeping willows looked fresher and greener after the rain.
红楼翠竹交相掩映。
Hónglóu cuìzhú jiāoxiāngyǎnyìng。
The red buildings and green bamboos set each other off.
翡翠琢成的小茶壶
fěicuì zhuóchéng de xiǎocháhú 
a small carved jadeite teapot
珠翠
zhūcuì
pearls and jade; ornaments made with pearls and jade
他家有个祖传的翡翠扳指儿，很值钱。
Tā jiā yǒu gè zǔchuán de fěicuì bānzhǐr，hěnzhíqián。
He has a jadeite ring passed down from his ancestors. It is worth a lot of money now.
此地青山掩映，苍翠欲滴。
Cǐdì qīngshān yǎnyìng，cāngcuì yùdī。
There are many green mountains in this area, everywhere you see is green.
他高尚的品格好比苍松翠柏，万古长青。

Like pines and cypresses, his qualities are forever great.
这座小城掩映在一片苍山翠柏之中。

This small city and the stretch of bluish green cypresses set each other off.
这个翠生生的玉白菜，价值连城。

细雨过后，山色越发显得翠微。
Xìyǔ guòhòu，shānsè yuè fā xiǎnde cuìwēi。
After the light rain, the shady retreat on the green hills became more and more distinct.
这几排翠竹成了大熊猫的乐园。
Zhè jǐ pái cuìzhú chéng le dàxióngmāo de lèyuán。
These lines of emerald bamboos have become a playground for pandas.
站在这里向远山看去，是一片滴翠的绿色。
Zhànzài zhèlǐ xiàng yuǎnshān kànqù，shì yípiàn dīcuì de lǜsè。
Looking at the distant mountain from here, one can see a stretch of vivid green.
这个森林公园，空气清新，群山叠翠。
Zhège sēnlín gōngyuán，kōngqì qīngxīn，qúnshān diécuì。
The air is fresh and the trees are green all over the mountains in this forest garden.
这个翡翠绿莹莹的，成色极好！
Zhège fěicuì lǜyíngyíng de，chéngsè jíhǎo！
This glittering green emerald is of high purity.

致贺词
zhì hècí
give a speech of congratulation
您要出书的事我已敬悉，正准备向您致贺。
Nín yào chūshū de shì wǒ yǐ jìngxī，zhèng zhǔnbèi xiàng nín zhìhè。
I am going to congratulate you on your new book to be pulished.
主婚人向这对新婚夫妇致新婚贺辞。
Zhǔhūnrén xiàng zhè duì xīnhūn fūfù zhì xīnhūn hècí。
The master of the wedding ceremony delivers a speech of congratulation to the newlyweds.
致以节日的祝贺
zhìyǐ jiérì de zhùhè

Jīntiān tā jǔxínghūnlǐ，xǔduō tóngshì qián lái hèxǐ。

庆贺胜利
qìnghè shènglì
celebrate the victory

qìnghè Lǎo Zhāng dé jiǎng
congratulate Lao Zhang on winning the award

rèliè de zhùhè
warm congratulations
恭祝圣诞，并贺新禧
gōngzhù shèngdàn，bìng hè xīn xǐ
With Best Wishes for a Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year
贺仪
hèyí 
present for wedding, birthday, etc.
表示衷心的祝贺
biǎoshì zhōngxīn de zhùhè 
extend cordial greetings

zhùhè yìshùjiāmen yǎnchū chénggōng
congratulate the artists on their successful performance

dàohè
congratulate

这是明令禁止的事，你怎么还敢闯红灯？

闯进来
chuǎnɡ jìnlái 
rush in; break in; force one\'s way in
他是自己闯出来的。
Tā shì zìjǐ chuǎngchūlái de。
He has hewed out his path on his own.
我们必须闯出一条新路子。
Wǒmen bìxū chuǎngchū yìtiáo xīn lùzi。
We must break a new path.
你闯祸了。

Look what you\'ve done!

Tā shì jìshù géxīn de chuǎngjiàng。

dāoshān gǎn shàng，huǒhǎi gǎn chuǎng

确定会议宗旨
quèdìng huìyì zōngzhǐ
define the aims of the conference

The aim of our shop is honest operation, and so neither the old nor the young will be cheated.
宗旨。
宗旨。
宣明办学宗旨。
不能背离党的宗旨
会章中规定了学会的宗旨和任务

阐明宗旨。
The purpose of the organization needs to be translated into management actions.

需要将这个组织的宗旨转化成具体的管理行动。
The organisation aims to meet the wants of the poor and homeless.

这个组织的宗旨是满足穷人及无家可归者的需要。
They set up a group with a remit to suggest ways for strengthening family life.

他们成立了一个小组，宗旨是探讨加强家庭生活的方式。
文章的主旨
wénzhāng de zhǔzhǐ 
the gist of the article
译文必须忠实于原文的主旨。
Yìwén bìxū zhōngshíyú yuánwén de zhǔzhǐ。
A translated text should be true to the purpose of the original.
主旨。
会议的主旨。
这次参赛以锻炼队伍为主旨。
秉承主子的旨意。
The cause of this foundation is to help women with breast cancer.
创立这一基金的主旨是为了帮助那些患乳腺癌的妇女。
The chief idea of this project was to maximize profits.
这项计划的主旨就是使利润最大化。
Meeting new people was the chief purpose of this reunion.
会见新人是这次重聚的主旨。
The aim of this book is to teach a new learner basic English.
Zhè běn shū de zhǔzhǐ shì xiàng chūxuézhě jiàoshòu jīběn yīngyǔ。
这本书的主旨是向初学者教授基本英语。
The burden of his speech was that divorce should be illegal.
Tā de yǎnjiǎng de zhǔzhǐ shì，líhūn yīngdāng bèi rènwéi shì fēifǎ de。
他的演讲的主旨是，离婚应当被认为是非法的。
The essence of this book is how to make more money.
Zhè běn shū de zhǔzhǐ jiùshì rúhé zhuànqián。
这本书的主旨就是如何赚钱。
The audience was held by the substance of the play rather than by the superficies of the production.
Yǐnqǐ guānzhòng xìngqù de shì nà chū xì de zhǔzhǐ érfēi zuòpǐn de biǎomiànxiànxiàng。
引起观众兴趣的是那出戏的主旨而非作品的表面现象。
Which is fair enough, but not much of a basis for a book.
zhè huà shuō de méicuò，dàn bùzúyǐ chéngwéi yìběn shū de zhǔzhǐ。
这话说得没错，但不足以成为一本书的主旨。
Fundamental islamicists threaten to perturb the social order in Algeria and Egypt.
Yuánjiàozhǐzhǔyì Yīsīlán fēnzǐ wēixié yào pòhuài Ā\'ěrjílìyà hé Āijí de shèhuì zhìxù。
原教旨主义伊斯兰分子威胁要破坏阿尔及利亚和埃及的社会秩序。
Redirect your attention to the danger from the fundamentalists.
Qǐng bǎ nǐmen de zhùyìlì jízhōng dào Yuánjiàozhǐzhǔyì dàilái de wēixiǎn shàng。
请把你们的注意力集中到原教旨主义带来的危险上。
旨在唤起民众
zhǐ zài huànqǐ mínzhònɡ 
for the purpose of arousing the masses
旨在加快工程进度的措施
zhǐ zài jiākuài gōngchéngjìndù de cuòshī 
measures aimed at speeding up the project
这位僧人旨在传布佛教。
Zhèwèi sēngrén zhǐzài chuánbù fójiào。
皇帝传旨在御花园传见封疆大吏。
Huángdì chuánzhǐ zài yùhuāyuán chuánjiàn fēngjiāng dàlì。
An imperial order was delivered that the Emperor would call on the high officer of the frontier at the imperial garden.
我们做这些题，旨在加强同学们的应试能力。
Wǒmen zuò zhèxiē tí，zhǐ zài jiāqiáng tóngxuémen de yìngshì nénglì。
These exercises are aiming at improving the students\' abilities to take exams.
旨在引起大家注意。
这篇文章本旨在于提倡救死扶伤。
办在职训练班，旨在给大家充电。
She is in a competition designed to find promising country music talents.
她参加了一场比赛，这场比赛旨在发掘有潜力的乡村音乐天才。
The course is intended to increase student\'s interpersonal skills.
这个课程旨在提高学生与人交流的技巧。
A committee was formed to look into the possibility of starting a soccer league.
一团体成立起来，旨在调查发起足球联赛的可能性。
Congress adopted the law to eliminate the spreading corruption in the government.
国会通过了这项法案，旨在消除政府中日益猖獗的腐败现象。
In 1601 Parliament passed an act, which aimed to provide the poor with more jobs.
1601 nián，guóhuì tōngguòle yí xiàng zhǐzài xiàng pínkùn qúntǐ tígōng gèngduō gōngzuò jīhuì de fǎ\'àn。
1601年，国会通过了一项旨在向贫困群体提供更多工作机会的法案。
A new cancer charity to raise money for research was launched yesterday.

昨天，一个新的旨在筹集研究资金的癌症慈善团体成立了。

He aimed at driving home the dangers.
Tā zhǐ zài jiǎng qīngchu zhèxiē wēixiǎn。
他旨在讲清楚这些危险。
Every successful company aims to increase its market share.
Měi yí gè chénggōng de gōngsī dōu zhǐ zài zēngjiā shìchǎng fèn\'é。
每一个成功的公司都旨在增加市场份额。
Local schools will benefit from a project aimed at reducing energy waste in classrooms.

The change was intended to increase sales.

这种变化旨在提高销售额。

起源史学旨在再现文学作品的起源。
你这样做是奉谁的旨意？
Nǐ zhèyàngzuò shì fèngshéi de zhǐyì? 
On whose orders did you do this?

bǐngchéng mǒurén de yìzhǐ 
in compliance with sb.\'s wish

quèdìng huìyì zōngzhǐ
define the aims of the conference

文章的主旨
wénzhāng de zhǔzhǐ 
the gist of the article
圣旨
shèngzhǐ
imperial edict
这位僧人旨在传布佛教。
Zhèwèi sēngrén zhǐzài chuánbù fójiào。
熟读四书五经，他深得其中奥旨。
Shúdú sìshū wǔjīng，tā shēndé qí zhōng àozhǐ。
He did a thorough study of the classics, and was conversant with their meanings.
相信大家已经领会了这篇文章的本旨。
Xiāngxìn dàjiā yǐjing lǐnghuì le zhèpiān wénzhāng de běnzhǐ。
I believe that everyone has grasped the main idea of this article.
皇帝传旨在御花园传见封疆大吏。
Huángdì chuánzhǐ zài yùhuāyuán chuánjiàn fēngjiāng dàlì。
An imperial order was delivered that the Emperor would call on the high officer of the frontier at the imperial garden.
他给我讲了这部电影的剧情大旨。
Tā gěi wǒ jiǎng le zhèbù diànyǐng de jùqíng dàzhǐ。
He told me the film\'s plot.
玄奘法师一生都致力于弘扬法旨。
Xuán Zàng fǎshī yìshēng dōu zhìlìyú hóngyáng fǎzhǐ。
Xu Zang devoted all his life to promoting the ideas of Buddhist doctrines.
小明坚信没有什么仙家法旨，并劝奶奶也不要相信。
Xiǎo Míng jiānxìn méiyǒu shénme xiānjiā fǎzhǐ，bìng quàn nǎinai yě búyào xiāngxìn。
Xiao Ming doesn’t believe in the power of Buddha and tries to dissuade his grandma from that belief.
皇上降旨命将军回师南下。
Huángshàng jiàngzhǐ mìng jiāngjūn huíshī nánxià。
The Emperor gave orders requesting the general to withdraw the army and move towards the south.
教皇通过传教士向教徒传达教旨。
Jiàohuáng tōngguò chuánjiàoshì xiàng jiàotú chuándá jiàozhǐ。
The pope uses missionaries to convey his doctrines to believers.
皇上有旨，这道难题今番必须解决。
Huángshàng yǒuzhǐ，zhè dào nántí jīnfān bìxū jiějué。
The emperor oders that this tough question be solved this time.
这篇文章的论旨很清晰，没有什么复杂难懂的地方。
Zhèpiān wénzhāng de lùnzhǐ hěnqīngxī，méiyǒu shénme fùzá nándǒng de dìfāng。
The article has a clear argumentation, and contains nothing complicated.
这封密旨一定要妥善保管，千万不能丢失。
Zhè fēng mìzhǐ yídìng yào tuǒshàn bǎoguǎn，qiānwàn bùnéng diūshī。
This secret imperial edict must be kept safely. You must not lose it.
我店的宗旨就是诚信经营，童叟无欺。
Wǒ diàn de zōngzhǐ jiùshì chéngxìn jīngyíng，tóngsǒu wúqī。
The aim of our shop is honest operation, and so neither the old nor the young will be cheated.
通常电视剧里宣旨的都是太监。
Tōngcháng diànshìjù lǐ xuānzhǐ de dōushì tàijiān。
In TV series, it is usually the eunuch who announces the emperor\'s orders.
皇太后的懿旨请你火速进宫议事。
Huángtàihòu de yìzhǐ qǐng nǐ huǒsù jìngōng yìshì。
The decree of the empress dowager asks you to enter the palace and discuss issues immediately.
我们做这些题，旨在加强同学们的应试能力。

These exercises are aiming at improving the students\' abilities to take exams.
他的提议根本无关宏旨，大家不要理会他。
Tā de tíyì gēnběn wúguān hóngzhǐ，dàjiā búyào lǐhuì tā。
His proposition has nothing to do with our theme, ignore him.

使用保险套能够有效防止性病及艾滋病的传播。
Shǐyòng bǎoxiǎntào nénggòu yǒuxiào fángzhǐ xìngbìng jí àizībìng de chuánbō。
Condoms can protect against AIDS and other sexually-transmitted diseases.
他被人贬损了一通，心里很不是滋味。
Tā bèi rén biǎnsǔn le yítòng，xīnlǐ hěnbúshì zīwèi。
He was upset for being belittled.

Shìliàng fēnghuāfěn yǔ fēngmì tiáohé，měitiān yǐnyòng yìxiē，jì zībǔ yòu měiróng。

蜂王浆富含多种营养物质，是食疗滋补的佳品。
Fēngwángjiāng fùhán duōzhǒng yíngyǎng wùzhì，shì shíliáo zībǔ de jiāpǐn。

浮生性植物是蚊虫滋生的温床。

formulate a new policy

nǐgǔzhīzuò
a work modelled after the ancients

拟作
据学者考证，《与苏武书》并非李陵所作，而是齐梁间文人的拟作。
编拟写作提纲
拟古之作
唐人小说多以&quot;传奇&quot;为名，后人则泛称唐人小说及模拟其体例的作品为传奇
把毫无关系的历史事件和现实生活强作类比，实在是拟于不伦。
a mock battle
模拟作战
It was independently developed in more than one place as an onomatopoetic term.
Zuòwéi yí gè nǐshēngcí，tā shì zài bùtóng dìfang dúlì fāzhǎn de。
作为一个拟声词，它是在不同地方独立发展的。
An active placebo mimics the side effects of the experimental drug.
Yì zhǒng yǒuxiào de duìzhàojì mónǐ chū le zhè zhǒng shíyànxìng yàowù de fùzuòyòng。
一种有效的对照剂模拟出了这种实验性药物的副作用。
He set the wheels in motion by drafting a new plan.
Tōngguò cǎonǐ yí fèn xīn de jìhuà，tā kāishǐ zhuóshǒu yì\'àn de yùnzuò。
通过草拟一份新的计划，他开始着手议案的运作。

He is a sound effects expert in a film factory, the sound effects of that movie were designed by him.

Gǔdài hànyǔ de nǐyīn wèntí shì yìmén hěnzhuānyè de xuéwèn。
The onomatope issue of ancient Chinese is highly professional scholarship.

Onomatopoeic words are imitative of noises.
Nǐshēngcí shì yònglái mófǎng shēngyīn de。
拟声词是用来模仿声音的。
Every analogue wireless system has background noise to a certain extent.

每个模拟无线系统都有一定程度的电子干扰音。
事实证明他的拟议是正确的。
Shìshí zhèngmíngtā de nǐyì shì zhèngquè de。
Facts show that his recommendations were sound.

Virtual reality is seen as an exciting new technology with a lot of potential.

Zài shùzì shízhōng biàn de chángjiàn zhīqián méi rén tīngshuōguò mónǐ shízhōng（analog clock），suǒyǐ mónǐ shízhōng shì yígè fǎn pú cí。

Cooperating with the photographer, she continually altered her hairstyle.
摄影师示意我头向左边倾斜一点。

The cameraman signaled me to tilt my head a little to the right.

The three photographers each stand at the top of their professions.

这个摄像机不断地四处移动。
Frustrated at seeing months of work go down the drain，the detective fired a shot at the camera.
Kàndào jǐ gè yuè de láodòng báibái bèi làngfèi，jǔsàng de dǎoyǎn cháozhe shèxiàngjī kāile yì qiāng。
看到几个月的劳动白白被浪费，沮丧的导演朝着摄像机开了一枪。
The security cameras were installed to give her a peace of mind.
Ānzhuāngle ānquán shèxiàngjī， tā gǎndào hěn ānxīn。
安装了安全摄像机，她感到很安心。
The camera could define the smallest object.
Zhè bù shèxiàngjī nénggòu bǔzhuō xìxiǎo de duìxiàng。
这部摄像机能够捕捉细小的对象。
The camera panned across the room.
Shèxiàngjī duìzhe zhěnggè wūzi yáodòng yíbiàn。
摄像机对着整个屋子摇动一遍。
At the moment of the murder, he is standing in front of television cameras and talking tactlessly.
Zài móushā\'àn fāshēng de shíhòu，tā zhèng zhànzài shèxiàngjī qián bènzhuō de jiǎnghuà。
在谋杀案发生的时侯，他正站在摄像机前笨拙地讲话。
He acts very securely in front of the camera.
Tā zài shèxiàngjī miànqián biǎoxiàn de hěn zìrán。
他在摄像机面前表现得很自然。
Television cameras were admitted in the courtroom.
Yǔnxǔ xiédài shèxiàngjī jìnrù fǎtíng。
允许携带摄像机进入法庭。
这台摄像机的摄像管损坏了，要更换一个新的。
Zhètái shè xiàng jī de shè xiàng guǎn sǔnhuài le，yào gēnghuàn yígè xīn de。
The vidicon of this video camera is broken. We need a new one.
录像摄像机
lùxiànɡ shèxiànɡjī
video camera
电视摄像机
diànshì shèxiànɡjī
television camera; TV camera
小型摄像机
xiǎoxínɡ shèxiànɡjī
minicam
这种摄像头的感光度很好。
Zhèzhǒng shè xiàng tóu de gǎnguāngdù hěnhǎo。
This kind of camera shows high light sensitivity.
在哪里能买到摄像机护罩？
Zài nǎlǐ néng mǎidào shè xiàng jī hùzhào？
Where can I buy vidicon shield?
摄像机的镜头卡口有许多种形状。
Shè xiàng jī de jìngtóu kǎkǒu yǒu xǔduō zhǒng xíngzhuàng。
There are many shapes of camera lens bayonet-sockets.
全色多谱摄像仪。
The cameras were rolling.
Shèxiàngjī zhèngzài shèxiàng。
摄像机正在摄像。
Your camcorder should have these basic functions: auto focus, playback facility and zoom lens.
你的摄像机应该具备以下基本功能：自动聚焦、回放和变焦。
on camera
在电视摄像机前
The doctor will probe your stomach with a camera.
医生会用带摄像头的胃镜检查你的胃。
The leader faced a number of questions before the television cameras.
Zhè wèi lǐngdǎo zài diànshì shèxiàngjī qián yùdàole yìxiē wèntí。
这位领导在电视摄像机前遇到了一些问题。
Digital cameras and digital video cameras began to appear last year.
Shùmǎ xiàngjī hé shùmǎ shèxiàngjī shì qùnián kāishǐ chūxiàn de。
数码相机和数码摄像机是去年开始出现的。
There are new cameras overlooking the major road arteries in town.
Yǒu xīn de shèxiàngtóu jiānshìzhe chéngzhèn zhōng de zhǔyào gōnglù gànxiàn。
有新的摄像头监视着城镇中的主要公路干线。
This phone also has the convenience of a built in camera.
Zhège diànhuà yě tígōng nèizhì shèxiàngtóu de biànlì。
这个电话也提供内置摄像头的便利。
Most camera lenses are not figured nearly as accurately as are telescope lenses.
Dàbùfèn shèxiàngjī de jìngtóu bùnéng zhédié jìngtóu nàyàng jīngzhǔn de chéngxiàng。
大部分摄像机的镜头不能折叠镜头那样精准地成像。
Without moving the camera, I shot the picture four times.
Wǒ yìlián sì cì bǔzhuōdàole zhège huàmiàn ér méiyǒu yídòng shèxiàngjī。
我一连四次捕捉到了这个画面而没有移动摄像机。
He watches everything through the lens of his video camera.
Tā tòuguò shèxiàngjī de jìngtóu guānchá suǒyǒu shìwù。
他透过摄像机的镜头观察所有事物。
The cameras flashed at the vehicles speeding by.
Shèxiàngtóu duì chāosù de chē jìnxíng le pāizhào。
摄像头对超速的车进行了拍照。
This one camera was continually being moved from place to place.
Zhège shèxiàngjī búduàn de sìchù yídòng。
这个摄像机不断地四处移动。

He has placed cameras everywhere to spy on us.
Tā yǐ sìchù ānfàngle shèxiàngtóu lái jiānshì wǒmen。
他已四处安放了摄像头来监视我们。

The photographic film was overexposed and there is no image.
Zhè zhāng zhàopiàn gǎnguāng guòdù，méiyǒu rènhé yǐngxiàng pāishè xiàlái。
这张照片感光过度，没有任何影像拍摄下来。
The photographer made excellent portraits.
Nà wèi shèyǐngshī pāishèle chūsè de xiàoxiàng zhào。
那位摄影师拍摄了出色的肖像照。
摄氏温度计
shèshìwēndùjì
Celsius thermometer
摄氏温度表
Shèshì wēndùbiǎo 
centigrade (or Celsius) thermometer
温度降到摄氏零下十度。
Wēndù jiàngdào shèshì língxià shí dù。
The temperature dropped to minus ten degrees centigrade.
一百摄氏度是水从液态转变为气态的临界温度。
Yìbǎi shèshìdù shì shuǐ cóng yètài zhuǎnbiànwéi qìtài de línjiè wēndù。
100℃ is the critical temperature for water to change from liquid state to gas state.
摄氏温度计。
a celsius thermometer
摄氏温度表
The objective is to obtain a temperature in the neighborhood of 50-60 centigrade.
Mùbiāo jiùshì huòdé jiējìn wǔshí dào liùshí shèshìdù de wēndù。
目标就是获得接近50-60摄氏度的温度。
The game was played in spite of the 40-degree temperature.
Jǐnguǎn qìwēn gāodá sìshí shèshìdù，bǐsài réngrán jìnxíng。
尽管气温高达40摄氏度，比赛仍然进行。
A critical temperature of water is 100 degrees C--its boiling point at standard atmospheric pressure.
Shuǐ de línjiè wēndù shì 100 shèshìdù——í zài biāozhǔn dī qìyā xià de fèidiǎn。
水的临界温度是100摄氏度——即在标准低气压下的沸点。
He calibrated the thermometer for the celsius scale.
Tā duì wēndùjì de shèshì kèdù jìnxíngle jiàozhǔn。
他对温度计的摄氏刻度进行了校准。
The temperature can rise up to thirty-eight degrees Celsius in summer.
夏季气温可能升到38摄氏度。
Global temperatures will increase as much as three degrees centigrade.
Quánqiú de wēndù huì shàngshēng sān shèshìdù。
全球的温度会上升三摄氏度。
When the core temperature of the star reaches 1.3 billion degrees neon reacts to form oxygen.
Dāng héngxīng de héxīn wēndù dádào shísān yì shèshìdù de shíhou，nǎi jiù huì tōngguò huàxuéfǎnyìng biànchéng yǎng。
当恒星的核心温度达到13亿摄氏度的时候，氖就会通过化学反应变成氧。
The temperature has soared up to 42°C.
Wēndù biāoshēng zhì sìshí\'èr shèshìdù。
温度飙升至42摄氏度。
Steel in solution will exceed fifteen thousand degrees centigrade.
液态铁的温度超过一万五千摄氏度。
The temperature outside dropped 20 to 30 degrees below freezing.
Wàimiàn de wēndù jiàngzhì língxià 20 zhì 30 shèshìdù。
外面的温度降至零下20至30摄氏度。
摄氏温标
shèshì wēnbiāo 
Celsius\' thermometric scale
A critical temperature of water is 100 degrees C--its boiling point at standard atmospheric pressure.
Shuǐ de línjiè wēndù shì 100 shèshìdù——í zài biāozhǔn dī qìyā xià de fèidiǎn。
水的临界温度是100摄氏度——即在标准低气压下的沸点。
The objective is to obtain a temperature in the neighborhood of 50-60 centigrade.
Mùbiāo jiùshì huòdé jiējìn wǔshí dào liùshí shèshìdù de wēndù。
目标就是获得接近50-60摄氏度的温度。
水在一百摄氏度的状态下会变成气体。
Shuǐ zài yìbǎi shèshìdù de zhuàngtài xià huì biànchéng qìtǐ。
Water will turn into gas at a temperature of 100 degrees.
一百摄氏度是水从液态转变为气态的临界温度。
Yìbǎi shèshìdù shì shuǐ cóng yètài zhuǎnbiànwéi qìtài de línjiè wēndù。
100℃ is the critical temperature for water to change from liquid state to gas state.
摄氏温度计
shèshìwēndùjì
Celsius thermometer
摄氏温度表
Shèshì wēndùbiǎo 
centigrade (or Celsius) thermometer
温度降到摄氏零下十度。
Wēndù jiàngdào shèshì língxià shí dù。
The temperature dropped to minus ten degrees centigrade.
纯铁加热到摄氏1，535度就熔化。
Chúntiě jiārè dào shèshì yìqiānwǔbǎisānshíwǔ dù jiù rónghuà。
Pure iron melts at 1,535℃.
摄氏零下十度
shèshì língxià shídù
10 degrees below zero centigrade; minus 10 degrees centigrade

The temperature can rise up to thirty-eight degrees Celsius in summer.

今天外面真的很热，大概得有35摄氏度了。

镁是一种轻金属，在20摄氏度时的比重为1.74。

摄食行为
shèshí xíngwéi
feeding behaviour
摄食
不少稀有动物由于摄食困难而濒临灭绝。
Amoebas incept food particles．
变形虫摄取食物剩渣。
A person without enough food will be more vulnerable to disease.
摄入食物不够的人更容易患病。
Table 4 is an example of a typical day\'s food intake.
Biǎo sì shì yí gè diǎnxíng de yìtiān shíwù shèrù de fànlì。
表4是一个典型的一天食物摄入的范例。
Virtually everyone has heard about the importance of adequate protein in the diet.
Shìshíshàng měigè rén dōu tīngshuōguò zài yǐnshí zhōng shèqǔ shìdàng dànbáizhì de zhòngyàoxìng。
事实上每个人都听说过在饮食中摄取适当蛋白质的重要性。
Research has shown that allowing mealtimes to drag on rarely results in any more food being eaten.
Yánjiū xiǎnshì，jìncān shíjiān de yáncháng jīhū búhuì zàochéng rènhé duōyú shíwù de shèrù。
研究显示，进餐时间的延长几乎不会造成任何多余食物的摄入。
She made a record of seven days of fairly typical intake of food and drink.
Tā duì qī tiān lǐ xiāngdāng diǎnxíng de shíwù hé yǐnliào de shèrù zuòle jìlù。
她对七天里相当典型的食物和饮料的摄入做了记录。
过量摄入脂肪对健康不利
Low consumption of  iron can cause anemia, but I don\'t think that\'s the case here.
铁摄入量不足容易造成贫血症，但我想这不是问题所在。
It is easy to adjust your daily calorie intake so that you gain or lose weight.
Hěn róngyì tōngguò tiáozhěng nǐ měi tiān de Kǎlùlǐ shèrùliàng lái tígāo huò jiàngdī tǐzhòng。
很容易通过调整你每天的卡路里摄入量来提高或降低体重。
They will certainly need to take in plenty of liquid.
他们肯定要摄入大量的水份。
过量摄入脂肪对健康不利
They will certainly need to take in plenty of liquid.
他们肯定要摄入大量的水份。

A person without enough food will be more vulnerable to disease.
摄入食物不够的人更容易患病。
Table 4 is an example of a typical day\'s food intake.

表4是一个典型的一天食物摄入的范例。

pāishè yì zhāngzhàopiàn
take a photo
拍摄特写镜头
pāishè tèxiě jìngtóu
shoot a close-up

bǎ wǔjù pāishè chéng diànyǐng

zài pāishè wàijǐnɡ
be on location
实景拍摄
shíjǐng pāishè
shoot on location
拍摄外景
pāishè wàijǐnɡ

compensation for sth
因某事而获得的赔偿金
in compensation (for sth)
作为(某事的)赔偿金
to pay 5,000 pounds in damages
支付5，000英镑赔偿金
to do more harm than good
得不偿失
to make it up to sb
对某人作出补偿

我保证对你作出补偿。

bǔcháng suǒ shòu de sǔnshī

补偿差额
bǔchángchā\'é 
make up a deficiency

Mínfǎ de zuòyòng shì bǔcháng，xíngfǎ de zuòyòng shì chéngfá。
民法的作用是补偿，刑法的作用是惩罚。
I believe she is over compensating for the mistakes made in her past.

刻意修饰
kèyì xiūshì
be very meticulous about clothes or makeup

定语的作用是修饰或限制名词的。
Dìngyǔ de zuòyòngshì xiūshì huò xiànzhì míngcí de。
An attribute is a word or phrase used to modify or limit the meaning of a noun.
修饰
xiūshì
decorate; adorn; embellish
华丽的言语修饰不了他枯涩的感情。
Huálì de yányŭ xiūshìbùliǎo tā kūsè de gǎnqíng。
他不喜欢修饰外表，但却是个很有内蕴的人。
Tā bùxǐhuan xiūshì wàibiǎo，dàn què shì gè hěnyǒu nèiyùn de rén。
He dislikes wearing make up, but he is a man of implication.
他的文章写得太平直，没有一点修饰。
Tā de wénzhāng xiě de tài píngzhí，méiyǒu yìdiǎn xiūshì。
His article is too simple, it doesn\'t have any embellishments.
副词属于虚辞，有修饰的作用。
Fùcí shǔyú xūcí，yǒu xiū shì de zuòyòng。
The adverb is a kind of form word, which has a modifying function.
修饰
修饰门面。
稍加修饰，容貌更显美好。
修饰文辞。
装修墙壁可使用壁纸或装饰布。
An attribute can be a word, phrase or clause that modifies a noun.
修饰语可以是修饰名词的一个词、短语或者是从句。
Black in black cat is an attributive.
black cat中的black是修饰性形容词。
&quot;old&quot; modifies &quot;man&quot; in old man
在词组old man中，old修饰man
to trim one\'s mustache
修饰胡须
As a rule, the locative postposition only modifies inanimate nouns.
按规则，方位后置词只能修饰无生命的名词。
Attributive clauses can modify nouns.
定语从句可以修饰名词。
The adjective &quot;red&quot; in the phrase &quot;an red bag&quot; modifies &quot;bag&quot;.
词组“一个红书包”中，形容词“红”修饰“书包”。
In Spanish the adjective can be postponed after the word it modifies.
西班牙语中，形容词可以放在所修饰的词之后。
Dressing leather is a long a process.
Xiūshì pígé shì yí xiàng hàoshí gōngyì。
修饰皮革是一项耗时工艺。
These features of the gospels are neither simple history nor redundant embroidery.
Fúyīnshū zhōng de zhèxiē gùshi jì bú shì jiǎndān de lìshǐ，yě bú shì rǒngyú de xiūshì。
福音书中的这些故事既不是简单的历史，也不是冗余的修饰。
Most English adjectives precede the noun they modify.
Duōshù yīngyǔ xíngróngcí chūxiàn zài tāmen suǒ xiūshì de míngcí zhī qián。
多数英语形容词出现在他们所修饰的名词之前。
This shirt is not finished properly.
Zhè jiàn chènshān háiméiyǒu wánquán xiūshì hǎo。
这件衬衫还没有完全修饰好。
The carpenter finished the table beautifully.
Mùjiang zuì hòu wánměi de bǎ zhuōzi xiūshì yí biàn。
木匠最后完美地把桌子修饰一遍。
The effect was achieved by skillful retouching.
Xūyào qiǎomiào de xiūshì cáinéng kànchū xiàoguǒ。
需要巧妙的修饰才能看出效果。
&quot;Mr. Pickwick took his hat and his leave&quot; is an example of zeugma.
“Mr. Pickwick took his hat and his leave”（Pǐkèwēikè xiānsheng nále tā de màozi hé tā de líkāi）shì gòng è xiūshì de yígè lìzi。
“Mr. Pickwick took his hat and his leave”（匹克威克先生拿了他的帽子和他的离开）是共轭修饰的一个例子。
The mystery has been heightened by many embellishments in subsequent retellings.
Zhège mí zài hòulái duōcì de fùshù zhōng bèi jiāgōng xiūshì ér xiǎn de yuèláiyuè shénmì。
这个谜在后来多次的复述中被加工修饰而显得越来越神秘。
The manager was a beautifully groomed young man.
Jīnglǐ shì yí gè xiūshì de fēicháng détǐ de niánqīngrén。
经理是一个修饰的非常得体的年轻人。
The genitive noun is used attributively.
Shǔ gé míngcí bèi yòngzuò xiūshì chéngfèn。
属格名词被用作修饰成分。
This photograph has been retouched!
Zhè zhāng zhàopiàn bèi xiūshìguò！
这张照片被修饰过！
Her litmus test for good breeding is whether you split infinitives.
Tā cèshì biérén shìfǒu jùyǒu liánghǎo jiàoyǎng de biāozhǔn shì kàn duìfāng shìfǒu zài búdìng shì de dòngcí qián jiā xiūshì fùcí。
她测试别人是否具有良好教养的标准是看对方是否在不定式的动词前加修饰副词。
The primping alone took more than an hour.
Dān shì jīngxīn xiūshì jiù huāle yí gè duō xiǎoshí。
单是精心修饰就花了一个多小时。
The nonrestrictive clause in &quot;I always buy his books，which have influenced me greatly,&quot; refers to his books generally and adds an additional fact about them.
Zài“wǒ zǒngshì mǎi tā de shū，nàxiē shū duì wǒ yǐngxiǎng jí dà”yí jù zhōng，fēi xiàndìngxìng dìngyǔ cóngjù yìbān shì zhēnduì tā de shū jìnxíng fùjiāxìng xiūshì。
在“我总是买他的书，那些书对我影响极大”一句中，非限定性定语从句一般是针对他的书进行附加性修饰。
文过饰非
wénguòshìfēi
conceal faults and gloss over wrongs; gloss over one\'s faults; cover up (or explain away) one\'s errors
有错误就该承认并改正，你怎么能文过饰非呢？
Yǒu cuòwù jiù gāi chéngrèn bìng gǎizhèng，nǐ zěnme néng wénguò shìfēi ne？
You should admit and correct your mistakes rather than cover them up.
虚饰的文辞
xūshì de wéncí
flashy, empty words
我不喜欢过于藻饰的文章。
Wǒ bùxǐhuan guòyú zǎoshì de wénzhāng。
I don\'t like overly embellished articles.
《法句经》中的偈语本是众经中的精华，不加雕饰，自成文学。
《Fǎjùjīng》zhōng de jìyǔ běnshì zhòngjīngzhōng de jīnghuá，bùjiādiāoshì，zìchéngwénxué。
Chants and hymns of the Dhamrmapada Sutra are the essence of all the scriptures, an excellent work that doesn\'t need any polishing.
你的这篇文章还需要再雕饰一下。
Nǐ de zhèpiān wénzhāng hái xūyào zài diāoshì yíxià。
You should make some more improvements in this article.
这文章中的语言夸饰得有些过分了吧？
Zhè wénzhāng zhōng de yǔyán kuāshì de yǒuxiē guòfèn le ba？
Does the description in this article exaggerate excessively?
这篇文章语言质朴，毫无矫饰。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngyǔyán zhìpǔ，háo wú jiǎoshì。
This article is written in a simple style, free from any kind of affectation.
他的文章写得太平直，没有一点修饰。
Tā de wénzhāng xiě de tài píngzhí，méiyǒu yìdiǎn xiūshì。
His article is too simple, it doesn\'t have any embellishments.
不加文饰。
文过饰非
文过饰非。
文过饰非。
修饰文辞。
文字切忌雕饰。
文风朴实，不尚藻饰。
文笔清淡而不矫饰。
a mannered literary style
矫饰的文学风格
The scholar polished the article by adding some quotations from poems and stories.
这个学者通过添加一些来自诗和故事的引用，润饰了他的文章。
They have many fancy dress costume accessories including disguises, masks, gloves and tiaras.
Tāmen yōngyǒu xǔduō huàzhuāng wǔhuì shàng yòng de pèishì，qízhōng bāokuò wěizhuāng pǐn、miànjù、shǒutào hé tóushì。
他们拥有许多化装舞会上用的配饰，其中包括伪装品、面具、手套和头饰。
The arrow was flighted with bright feathers.
Zhège jiàntóu yòng míngliàng de yǔmáo jiāyǐ zhuāngshì。
这个箭头用明亮的羽毛加以装饰。
昂贵的首饰
ángguì de shǒushi 
costly jewels
她戴很多首饰。
Tā dài hěn duō shǒushì。
She wears a lot of jewelry.
在灯光的映衬下，她的黄金首饰灿灿发光。
Zài dēngguāng de yìngchèn xià，tā de huángjīn shǒushì càncàn fāguāng。
Her gold ornaments glittered under the light.
她俩用自己的名贵首饰暗中斗富。
Tā liǎng yòng zìjǐ de míngguì shǒushì àn zhōng dòufù。
The two women showed off their wealth through their expensive jewelry.
珠宝店里的钻石首饰光彩耀目。
Zhūbǎodiàn lǐ de zuànshí shǒushì guāngcǎi yàomù。
The diamond ornaments in the jewelry store are shining.
宝贵首饰
bǎoguì shǒushi
valuable jewellery
她被迫卖掉首饰。
Tā bèipò màidiào shǒushi。
She was forced to sell her jewellery.
他临走时裹走了一些首饰。
Tā línzǒushí guǒzǒule yìxiē shǒushi。
When he left he smuggled away some jewellery.
首饰
shǒushi
jewellery (英)
把首饰藏在箱子里
镀金的首饰
首饰
首饰
他在相看柜台里的首饰。
首饰匣内全是金银珠玉等宝物。
成色上等的首饰
华贵的首饰。
黄灿灿的金首饰
金玉首饰
This jewelry has been retained by a lady but we have some similar designs that you may be interested.
这件首饰已经被一位女士定下了，不过我们有些相似设计的首饰，您可能感兴趣。
She was robbed of all her jewels.
她的全部首饰被洗劫一空。
The price of this jewelry is too high.
这件首饰的价格太高了。
all her jewellery had gone
她所有的珠宝首饰都不见了
This old lady has some rare jewelries.
这位老妇人有一些珍贵的首饰。
The voguey young consumers are no longer excessively pursuing the valued material of jewelry.
追逐潮流的年轻消费者不再一味追求首饰的昂贵材质。
I decided to buy some jewelry for my mom.
Wǒ juédìng gěi wǒ māma mǎi yìxiē zhūbǎoshǒushì。
我决定给我妈妈买一些珠宝首饰。
You can clean most mens jewelry with a soft bristled toothbrush.
Nǐ kěyǐ yòng ruǎn máo yáshuā qīngjié dàduōshù nánshì shǒushì。
你可以用软毛牙刷清洁大多数男士首饰。
Men\'s wedding bands are among the most common form of men\'s jewelry purchased.
Jiéhūn jièzhi shì nánrénmen gòumǎi de xíngshì zuì pǔtōng de zhūbǎoshǒushì。
结婚戒指是男人们购买的形式最普通的珠宝首饰。
The shop was full of cheap, gaudy jewellery.
Zhè jiā diànlǐ dōushì xiē liánjià súqì de shǒushì。
这家店里都是些廉价俗气的首饰。
She opened a wooden chest and found all sorts of jewellery inside it.
Tā dǎkāile yí gè mùzhì de xiāngzi，fāxiàn lǐmiàn yǒu gèzhǒnggèyàng de shǒushì。
她打开了一个木制的箱子，发现里面有各种各样的首饰。
Pearl jewelry goes with almost all kinds of dresses and outfits.
Zhēnzhū shǒushì kěyǐ dāpèi gè zhǒng kuǎnshì de qúnzi hé wàitào。
珍珠首饰可以搭配各种款式的裙子和外套。
A curtain is drawn aside to reveal only the outermost golden casket.
Liánzi bèi xiānkāi，jǐn lùchū zuì wàicéng de yí gè jīnsè shǒushìhé。
帘子被掀开，仅露出最外层的一个金色首饰盒。
There is something missing in my jewelry box!
Wǒ shǒushìhé zhōng diū dōngxi le！
我首饰盒中丢东西了！
彩旦一般都由男性演员来饰演。
Cǎidàn yìbān dōu yóu nánxìng yǎnyuán lái shìyǎn。
Old female roles in Chinese operas are often played by male actors.
他在很多的清史剧里都饰演和绅，简直成了演和绅的专业户了。
Tā zài hěnduō de qīngshǐjù lǐ dōu shìyǎn Hé Shēn，jiǎnzhí chéng le yǎn Hé Shēn de zhuānyèhù le。
He has played the role of Heshen in many series that talk about the history of the Qing Dynasty, and may be called an actor specializing in Heshen roles.
黝黑的皮肤，健壮的肌肉是饰演庄稼汉的必备条件。
Yǒuhēi de pífū，jiànzhuàng de jīròu shì shìyǎn zhuāngjiàhàn de bìbèi tiáojiàn。
Dark skin and strong muscles are indispensable to farmers.
他饰演孙悟空。
Tā shìyǎn sūnwùkōng。
He plays the Monkey King.
饰演。
由著名演员饰演。
Madonna acted as Evita Peron in a musical.
麦当娜在一部音乐剧里饰演了埃维塔·庇隆一角。
Christopher Reeve, Superman, had a terrible accident riding a horse.
超人的饰演者克里斯托弗•里夫，在一次骑马时发生了严重意外。
Christopher Reeve made Superman.
克里斯托弗•里夫饰演了超人一角。
She played the part of Desdemona.
Tā shìyǎn táisī díméngnà de juésè。
她饰演苔丝狄蒙娜的角色。
She did an outstanding job as ophelia.
Tā shìyǎn ào Fēilìyà hěn chénggōng。
她饰演奥菲莉娅很成功。
His political ideas color his lectures.
Tā de zhèngzhì guāndiǎn fěnshìle tā de yǎnjiǎng。
他的政治观点粉饰了他的演讲。
他家的壁龛里摆放了很多饰物，都特别漂亮。
Tā jiā de bìkān lǐ bǎifàng le hěnduō shìwù，dōu tèbié piàoliàng。
There are many decorational items on the built-in cupboard in his house, which looks very nice.
听说鱼形装饰物可以聚财，她就在自己的店里挂了一个吉祥鱼。
Tīngshuō yúxíng zhuāngshìwù kěyǐ jùcái，tā jiù zài zìjǐ de diàn lǐ guà le yígè jíxiángyú。
It is said that displaying can help collect money, so she hangs an auspicious fish in her own store.
她身上的玉石饰物互相碰撞发出玲玎的响声。
Tā shēnshàng de yùshí shìwù hùxiāng pèngzhuàng fāchū língdīng de xiǎngshēng。
The jade accouterments on her collide with each other, and give out a tinkling sound.

活动最后，装饰物品都得被取下来。
The ornaments dangled from the tree.
Shù shàng guàmǎnle zhuāngshìwù。
树上挂满了装饰物。
He bought a Christmas tree and trimmings to decorate it.
Tā mǎile kē shèngdànshù jí yìxiē shìwù。
他买了棵圣诞树及一些饰物。
This bone china tea set is decorated with bands of cornucopias with corn in them in gilt with some red enamel.
这套骨瓷茶具，杯边有象征富饶的羊角装饰，有镀金的谷物点缀，还刷了一层红瓷漆。
The buildings were utilitarian rather than decorative.
Zhèxiē jiànzhùwù shì shíyòngxíng de érbúshì zhuāngshìxíng de。
这些建筑物是实用型的而不是装饰型的。
据说佩戴宝玉饰品可以得到好运。
Jùshuō pèidài bǎoyù shìpǐn kěyǐ dédào hǎoyùn。
It is said that wearing precious jade ornaments brings good luck.
他们在高档黄金饰品中掺假以牟取暴利。
Tāmen zài gāodàng huángjīn shìpǐn zhōng chānjiǎ yǐ móuqǔ bàolì。
They adulterated the high-quality gold ornaments to reap fabulous profits.
家里那盏老式玻璃风灯，如今成了怀旧的装饰品。
Jiā lǐ nà zhǎn lǎoshì bōli fēngdēng，rújīn chéng le huáijiù de zhuāngshìpǐn。
The old hand-held storm lantern has become a decoration which reminds one of old times.
蜡扦的样式越来越多，放在那可以作为装饰品。

这个小市场专门批零各种饰品。

This small marketplace specializes in the wholesale and retail of all kinds of ornaments.
女孩子们都喜欢各种各样的小饰品、小玩艺儿。

All girls like different kinds of little decorations and souvenirs.
太多的装饰品让我感觉烦躁。
Tài duō de zhuāngshìpǐn ràng wǒ gǎnjué fánzào。
Too many decorations agitate me.
点翠(用翡翠鸟的羽毛制作装饰品的手工工艺)

She refuses to mask her real face behind imagery.
Tā jùjué yǎnshì tā xíngxiàng hòumiàn de zhēnshí liǎnmiàn。
她拒绝掩饰她形象后面的真实脸面。

fine lace
精致的饰带
The metallic smell of the gold lace made her want to sneeze.

金饰带的金属味道让她想打喷嚏。
Behind the house lay two nude figures grotesquely bald, with deliberate knife-slashes marking their bodies.
Fángwū hòu fàngzhe liǎng gè luǒtǐ mótè，jíwéi kěxiào de shì mótè háowú zhuāngshì，érqiě shēnshàng hái dàiyǒu míngxiǎn de dāo hén。
房屋后放着两个裸体模特，极为可笑的是模特毫无装饰，而且身上还带有明显的刀痕。
The ribbon was used as a fringe for the dress.
Sīdài cháng yòngzuò yīfu de xiǎo zhuāngshì。
丝带常用作衣服的小装饰。
他的写作风格朴实简练，很少添加饰词。
Tā de xiězuò fēnggé pǔshí jiǎnliàn，hěnshǎo tiānjiā shìcí。
He writes simply and succinctly, rarely adding too much adornment.
定语的作用是修饰或限制名词的。
Dìngyǔ de zuòyòngshì xiūshì huò xiànzhì míngcí de。
An attribute is a word or phrase used to modify or limit the meaning of a noun.
副词属于虚辞，有修饰的作用。
Fùcí shǔyú xūcí，yǒu xiū shì de zuòyòng。
The adverb is a kind of form word, which has a modifying function.
从他的闪烁其词能看出他分明是在掩饰什么。
Cóng tā de shǎnshuòqící néng kànchū tā fēnmíng shì zài yǎnshì shénme。
You can tell from his evasive language that he\'s got something to hide.
Her litmus test for good breeding is whether you split infinitives.
Tā cèshì biérén shìfǒu jùyǒu liánghǎo jiàoyǎng de biāozhǔn shì kàn duìfāng shìfǒu zài búdìng shì de dòngcí qián jiā xiūshì fùcí。
她测试别人是否具有良好教养的标准是看对方是否在不定式的动词前加修饰副词。
In Spanish the adjective can be postponed after the word it modifies.
西班牙语中，形容词可以放在所修饰的词之后。
An attribute can be a word, phrase or clause that modifies a noun.
修饰语可以是修饰名词的一个词、短语或者是从句。
Attributive clauses can modify nouns.
定语从句可以修饰名词。
Most English adjectives precede the noun they modify.
Duōshù yīngyǔ xíngróngcí chūxiàn zài tāmen suǒ xiūshì de míngcí zhī qián。
多数英语形容词出现在他们所修饰的名词之前。
As a rule, the locative postposition only modifies inanimate nouns.
按规则，方位后置词只能修饰无生命的名词。
Black in black cat is an attributive.
black cat中的black是修饰性形容词。
The adjective &quot;red&quot; in the phrase &quot;an red bag&quot; modifies &quot;bag&quot;.
词组“一个红书包”中，形容词“红”修饰“书包”。
The genitive noun is used attributively.
Shǔ gé míngcí bèi yòngzuò xiūshì chéngfèn。
属格名词被用作修饰成分。
&quot;old&quot; modifies &quot;man&quot; in old man
在词组old man中，old修饰man

huābiān zhuānɡshì
lace trimmings
a dress with lace trim
饰花边的衣服
I bought a dress with golden lace trim.
我买了条有金色花边装饰的裙子。
The quilt was piped with cotton on the edge.
Bèizi de biān shàng zhuāngshì le miánxiàn。
被子的边上装饰了棉线。
She used lace to rim the front of the skirt.
Tā yòng lěi sī zhuāngshì tā qúnzi de qiánbiān。
她用蕾丝装饰她裙子的前边。
This bone china tea set is decorated with bands of cornucopias with corn in them in gilt with some red enamel.
