昂贵的首饰
ángguì de shǒushi 
costly jewels
花边装饰
huābiān zhuānɡshì
lace trimmings
服饰华丽
fúshì huálì
gorgeously dressed and richly ornamented
这篇文章语言质朴，毫无矫饰。
Zhèpiān wénzhāngyǔyán zhìpǔ，háo wú jiǎoshì。
This article is written in a simple style, free from any kind of affectation.
刻意修饰
kèyì xiūshì
be very meticulous about clothes or makeup
室内装饰的配色
shìnèi zhuāngshì de pèisè
the matching of colours in interior decoration
窗饰
chuāngshì
window decorations
她在《白毛女》里饰喜儿。
Tā zài《Báimáo Nǚ》li shì xǐr。
She played Xi\'er in The White-haired Girl.
室内装饰
shì nèi zhuāngshì
interior decoration
她戴很多首饰。
Tā dài hěn duō shǒushì。
She wears a lot of jewelry.
修饰公园，准备迎接五一。
Xiūshì ɡōnɡyuán, zhǔnbèi yínɡjiē Wǔ Yī。
The parks are decorated for the May Day celebrations.
请你把这篇稿子修饰一下。
Qǐngnǐ bǎ zhèpiān gǎozi xiūshì yíxià。
Please polish this piece of writing.
定语的作用是修饰或限制名词的。
Dìngyǔ de zuòyòngshì xiūshì huò xiànzhì míngcí de。
An attribute is a word or phrase used to modify or limit the meaning of a noun.
虚饰历史
xūshì lìshǐ
disguise historical facts
虚饰的文辞
xūshì de wéncí
flashy, empty words
掩饰错误
yǎnshì cuòwù
gloss over (or cover up) one\'s mistakes
掩饰真实的意图
yǎnshì zhēnshí de yìtú
conceal one\'s true intentions
衣饰华丽
yīshì huálì 
be gorgeously dressed
油饰一新
yóushìyìxīn 
freshly painted or varnished
精制的室外砖雕装饰
jīngzhì de shì wài zhuāndiāo zhuāngshì 
ornamented on the exterior with finely carved bricks
装饰图案
zhuānɡshì tú\'àn 
decorative pattern
修饰
xiūshì
decorate; adorn; embellish
文过饰非
wénguòshìfēi
conceal faults and gloss over wrongs; gloss over one\'s faults; cover up (or explain away) one\'s errors
华丽的言语修饰不了他枯涩的感情。
Huálì de yányŭ xiūshìbùliǎo tā kūsè de gǎnqíng。
据说佩戴宝玉饰品可以得到好运。
Jùshuō pèidài bǎoyù shìpǐn kěyǐ dédào hǎoyùn。
It is said that wearing precious jade ornaments brings good luck.
他家的壁龛里摆放了很多饰物，都特别漂亮。
Tā jiā de bìkān lǐ bǎifàng le hěnduō shìwù，dōu tèbié piàoliàng。
There are many decorational items on the built-in cupboard in his house, which looks very nice.
她家的壁饰还是我帮忙一起去买的呢。
Tā jiā de bìshì háishì wǒ bāngmáng yìqǐ qù mǎi de ne。
It is me who helped her to buy those wall decorations in her house.
彩旦一般都由男性演员来饰演。
Cǎidàn yìbān dōu yóu nánxìng yǎnyuán lái shìyǎn。
Old female roles in Chinese operas are often played by male actors.
这家店用了太多彩饰，显得色彩过多，有些繁琐。
Zhèjiā diàn yòng le tài duō cǎishì，xiǎnde sècǎi guòduō，yǒuxiē fánsuǒ。
This shop uses too many colorful decorations, which makes it look kind of fussy.
在灯光的映衬下，她的黄金首饰灿灿发光。
Zài dēngguāng de yìngchèn xià，tā de huángjīn shǒushì càncàn fāguāng。
Her gold ornaments glittered under the light.
他们在高档黄金饰品中掺假以牟取暴利。
Tāmen zài gāodàng huángjīn shìpǐn zhōng chānjiǎ yǐ móuqǔ bàolì。
They adulterated the high-quality gold ornaments to reap fabulous profits.
妈妈做了些窗饰，让我挂起来。
Māma zuò le xiē chuāngshì，ràng wǒ guà qǐlái。
Mother has made some window decorations and has asked me to hang them up.
这些灯饰，把客厅装点得真漂亮！
Zhèxiē dēngshì，bǎ kètīng zhuāngdiǎn de zhēn piàoliàng！
These lights make a really beautiful decoration in the living room!
他正在雕饰一张桌子。
Tā zhèngzài diāoshì yìzhāng zhuōzi。
He is carving a table.
这面墙上有着条纹状的雕饰。
Zhè miàn qiáng shàng yǒu zhe tiáowénzhuàng de diāoshì。
There are striated engravings on this wall.
你的这篇文章还需要再雕饰一下。
Nǐ de zhèpiān wénzhāng hái xūyào zài diāoshì yíxià。
You should make some more improvements in this article.
她俩用自己的名贵首饰暗中斗富。
Tā liǎng yòng zìjǐ de míngguì shǒushì àn zhōng dòufù。
The two women showed off their wealth through their expensive jewelry.
她喜欢购买和收藏漂亮的耳饰。
Tā xǐhuan gòumǎi hé shōucáng piàoliang de ěrshì。
She is fond of buying and collecting beautiful ear ornaments.
家里那盏老式玻璃风灯，如今成了怀旧的装饰品。
Jiā lǐ nà zhǎn lǎoshì bōli fēngdēng，rújīn chéng le huáijiù de zhuāngshìpǐn。
The old hand-held storm lantern has become a decoration which reminds one of old times.
这家门饰店中有许多款式别致的门窗挂件。
Zhèjiā ménshìdiàn zhōng yǒu xǔduō kuǎnshì biézhì de ménchuāng guàjiàn。
There are various kinds of unique window decorations in this decoration store.
这家饭店的装饰反璞归真，很有特色。
Zhèjiā fàndiàn de zhuāngshì fǎnpú guīzhēn，hěnyǒu tèsè。
The pure and simple style of this restaurant\'s decoration is really unique.
《法句经》中的偈语本是众经中的精华，不加雕饰，自成文学。
《Fǎjùjīng》zhōng de jìyǔ běnshì zhòngjīngzhōng de jīnghuá，bùjiādiāoshì，zìchéngwénxué。
Chants and hymns of the Dhamrmapada Sutra are the essence of all the scriptures, an excellent work that doesn\'t need any polishing.
听说鱼形装饰物可以聚财，她就在自己的店里挂了一个吉祥鱼。
Tīngshuō yúxíng zhuāngshìwù kěyǐ jùcái，tā jiù zài zìjǐ de diàn lǐ guà le yígè jíxiángyú。
It is said that displaying can help collect money, so she hangs an auspicious fish in her own store.
这文章中的语言夸饰得有些过分了吧？
Zhè wénzhāng zhōng de yǔyán kuāshì de yǒuxiē guòfèn le ba？
Does the description in this article exaggerate excessively?
拉祜族的服饰很漂亮。
Lāhùzú de fúshì hěnpiàoliàng。
The clothes of the Lahu ethnic group are quite beautiful.
每年春节时，我们都喜欢自己剪些拉花，装饰房间。
Měinián chūnjié shí，wǒmen dōu xǐhuan zìjǐ jiǎn xiē lāhuā，zhuāngshì fángjiān。
Each Spring Festival, we like cutting paper garlands to decorate the rooms.
蜡扦的样式越来越多，放在那可以作为装饰品。
Làqiān de yàngshì yuèláiyuè duō，fàngzài nà kěyǐ zuòwéi zhuāngshìpǐn。
Candlesticks come in many kinds and can be used as decorations.
这座大厦中作装饰的棱柱很特别，有异国风格。
Zhèzuò dàshà zhōng zuò zhuāngshì de léngzhù hěntèbié，yǒu yìguó fēnggé。
The decorative prism in the building is very unique with an alien style.
我们把灵寝装饰得庄严肃穆。
Wǒmen bǎ língqǐn zhuāngshì de zhuāngyán sùmù。
We decorated the seat of the bier awfully and solemnly.
她身上的玉石饰物互相碰撞发出玲玎的响声。
Tā shēnshàng de yùshí shìwù hùxiāng pèngzhuàng fāchū língdīng de xiǎngshēng。
The jade accouterments on her collide with each other, and give out a tinkling sound.
这根石柱有一条螺线的装饰条纹。
Zhè gēn shízhù yǒu yìtiáo luóxiàn de zhuāngshì tiáowén。
The stone pillar has a decorating spiral stripe.
我们听不懂闽剧，可对那些好看的服饰化妆很感兴趣。
Wǒmen tīng bùdǒng mǐnjù，kě duì nàxiē hǎokàn de fúshì huàzhuāng hěngǎn xìngqù。
We can not understand Fujian opera, but we are very interested in the beautiful clothes and cosmetics.
他不喜欢修饰外表，但却是个很有内蕴的人。
Tā bùxǐhuan xiūshì wàibiǎo，dàn què shì gè hěnyǒu nèiyùn de rén。
He dislikes wearing make up, but he is a man of implication.
他想用这些从贵州买回的傩戏面具装饰书房。
Tā xiǎng yòng zhèxiē cóng Guìzhōu mǎihuí de nuóxì miànjù zhuāngshì shūfáng。
He wants to decorate the study with Nuo opera masks bought in Guizhou province.
这个小市场专门批零各种饰品。
Zhège xiǎo shìchǎng zhuānmén pīlíng gèzhǒng shìpǐn。
This small marketplace specializes in the wholesale and retail of all kinds of ornaments.
这些蛋糕坯子，一会我要用奶油装饰它们。
Zhèxiē dàngāo pīzi，yíhuì wǒ yào yòng nǎiyóu zhuāngshì tāmen。
In a moment, I will decorate these semi-finished cakes with some cream.
56个民族的服饰骈阗多姿，各具风采。
Wǔshíliùgè mínzú de fúshì piántián duōzī，gèjù fēngcǎi。
Clothes of the fifty-six ethnic groups are assembled here, they all have their own style.
他的文章写得太平直，没有一点修饰。
Tā de wénzhāng xiě de tài píngzhí，méiyǒu yìdiǎn xiūshì。
His article is too simple, it doesn\'t have any embellishments.
我喜欢她发卡上的嵌饰。
Wǒ xǐhuan tā fāqiǎ shàng de qiànshì。
I like the inlaying in her hairpin.
这家餐厅的装饰极富西方情韵。
Zhèjiā cāntīng de zhuāngshì jí fù xīfāng qíngyùn。
The decoration of the restaurant is full of western style.
他的写作风格朴实简练，很少添加饰词。
Tā de xiězuò fēnggé pǔshí jiǎnliàn，hěnshǎo tiānjiā shìcí。
He writes simply and succinctly, rarely adding too much adornment.
有错误就该承认并改正，你怎么能文过饰非呢？
Yǒu cuòwù jiù gāi chéngrèn bìng gǎizhèng，nǐ zěnme néng wénguò shìfēi ne？
You should admit and correct your mistakes rather than cover them up.
女孩子们都喜欢各种各样的小饰品、小玩艺儿。
Nǚháizimen dōu xǐhuan gèzhǒng gèyàng de xiǎoshìpǐn、xiǎowányìr。
All girls like different kinds of little decorations and souvenirs.
奸细所有的伪饰都逃不过他锐利的眼睛。
Jiānxì suǒyǒu de wěishì dōu táobúguò tā ruìlì de yǎnjīng。
All the camouflage of the spies can\'t escape his sharp eyes.
丽丽的胸饰很别致，看得出来是个名贵的东西。
Lìlì de xiōngshì hěn biézhi，kàndéchūlái shì gè míngguì de dōngxi。
Lily\'s brooch looks exquisite. It must be very precious.
副词属于虚辞，有修饰的作用。
Fùcí shǔyú xūcí，yǒu xiū shì de zuòyòng。
The adverb is a kind of form word, which has a modifying function.
珠宝店里的钻石首饰光彩耀目。
Zhūbǎodiàn lǐ de zuànshí shǒushì guāngcǎi yàomù。
The diamond ornaments in the jewelry store are shining.
我国许多少数民族都有配戴银饰的习俗。

People from many ethnic groups in China have the habit of wearing silver ornaments.
我不喜欢过于藻饰的文章。
Wǒ bùxǐhuan guòyú zǎoshì de wénzhāng。
I don\'t like overly embellished articles.
圣诞节到了，教堂被整饰一新。
Shèngdànjié dào le，jiàotáng bèi zhěngshì yìxīn。
By the time Christmas gets here the church will be all decorated.
他在很多的清史剧里都饰演和绅，简直成了演和绅的专业户了。
Tā zài hěnduō de qīngshǐjù lǐ dōu shìyǎn Hé Shēn，jiǎnzhí chéng le yǎn Hé Shēn de zhuānyèhù le。
He has played the role of Heshen in many series that talk about the history of the Qing Dynasty, and may be called an actor specializing in Heshen roles.
黝黑的皮肤，健壮的肌肉是饰演庄稼汉的必备条件。
Yǒuhēi de pífū，jiànzhuàng de jīròu shì shìyǎn zhuāngjiàhàn de bìbèi tiáojiàn。
Dark skin and strong muscles are indispensable to farmers.
他买来装饰布把破旧的家布置了一番。
Tā mǎilái zhuāngshìbùbǎ pòjiù de jiā bùzhì le yì fān。
He bought upbolstery fabrics and redecorated his shabby home.
太多的装饰品让我感觉烦躁。
Tài duō de zhuāngshìpǐn ràng wǒ gǎnjué fánzào。

Tā bèipò màidiào shǒushi。

An attribute can be a word, phrase or clause that modifies a noun.
修饰语可以是修饰名词的一个词、短语或者是从句。

装饰音符号是用于表示几种音乐装饰的符号。

大多数的服饰书籍只能向你大致描述某段时期服装的特点。

按规则，方位后置词只能修饰无生命的名词。

超人的饰演者克里斯托弗•里夫，在一次骑马时发生了严重意外。

用…装饰的
for decoration
用于装饰
a floral arrangement
花饰
with no {or} without frills
毫无虚饰的

她所有的珠宝首饰都不见了
well-groomed
[+person] 服饰整洁的

Attributive clauses can modify nouns.
定语从句可以修饰名词。
The adjective &quot;red&quot; in the phrase &quot;an red bag&quot; modifies &quot;bag&quot;.
词组“一个红书包”中，形容词“红”修饰“书包”。
In Spanish the adjective can be postponed after the word it modifies.
西班牙语中，形容词可以放在所修饰的词之后。

The nonrestrictive clause in &quot;I always buy his books，which have influenced me greatly,&quot; refers to his books generally and adds an additional fact about them.

在“我总是买他的书，那些书对我影响极大”一句中，非限定性定语从句一般是针对他的书进行附加性修饰。

《Fǎjùjīng》zhōng de jìyǔ běnshì zhòngjīngzhōng de jīnghuá，bùjiādiāoshì，zìchéngwénxué。
Chants and hymns of the Dhamrmapada Sutra are the essence of all the scriptures, an excellent work that doesn\'t need any polishing.
精制的室外砖雕装饰
jīngzhì de shì wài zhuāndiāo zhuāngshì 
ornamented on the exterior with finely carved bricks
在屏风上雕饰四季景物。
整个房屋没有任何雕饰，显得十分朴素大方。
文字切忌雕饰。
雕饰古拙。
The cradle was ornately carved.
Zhège yáolán diāoshì huálì。
这个摇篮雕饰华丽。
the carved fretwork
Diāokè guò de zhuāngshì fúdiāo。
雕刻过的装饰浮雕。
The silver was decorated with a hand chasing method.
Yínqì cǎiyòng shǒugōng lòudiāo de fāngshì jiāyǐ zhuāngshì。
银器采用手工镂雕的方式加以装饰。
窗饰
chuāngshì
window decorations
妈妈做了些窗饰，让我挂起来。
Māma zuò le xiē chuāngshì，ràng wǒ guà qǐlái。
Mother has made some window decorations and has asked me to hang them up.
这家门饰店中有许多款式别致的门窗挂件。
Zhèjiā ménshìdiàn zhōng yǒu xǔduō kuǎnshì biézhì de ménchuāng guàjiàn。
There are various kinds of unique window decorations in this decoration store.
把门窗涂饰一新。
油饰门窗。
The shop window decorations beckoned.
Shāngdiàn chúchuāng de zhuāngshì hěn xīyǐn rén。
商店橱窗的装饰很吸引人。
She would window shop for the latest accessories.
Tā tòuguò shāngdiàn chúchuāng kàn zuì xīn de shìpǐn。
她透过商店橱窗看最新的饰品。
dress a store window
装饰商店的橱窗
The windows were decorated with decorated by a fringe of pinked cloth.
Chuānghu yòng jùchǐxíng de bù zuòchéng de liúsū zuò zhuāngshì。
窗户用锯齿形的布做成的流苏作装饰。
stating the unpleasant facts barely
不加掩饰地，陈述令人不快的事实
Her litmus test for good breeding is whether you split infinitives.
Tā cèshì biérén shìfǒu jùyǒu liánghǎo jiàoyǎng de biāozhǔn shì kàn duìfāng shìfǒu zài búdìng shì de dòngcí qián jiā xiūshì fùcí。
她测试别人是否具有良好教养的标准是看对方是否在不定式的动词前加修饰副词。

He has a genial and devoted wife.
他的后妻很贤惠，这让他很受人羡慕。
Tā de hòuqī hěnxiánhuì，zhè ràng tā hěnshòu rén xiànmù。
His digamous wife is very virtuous, which makes him envied by others.

举荐贤才
两耳不闻窗外事，一心只读圣贤书。
Liǎng\'ěrbùwénchuāngwàishì，yìxīnzhǐdúshèngxián shū。
Both ears are shut to what goes on outside the window; the whole mind is concentrated on the sages\' books (said, usu. disapprovingly, of one who is absorbed in study and oblivious of his surroundings).

There must be people of virtue inside a great mansion.
古代的先贤们都提倡天子施仁政来使四方归化。
Gǔdài de xiānxiánmen dōu tíchàng tiānzǐ shī rénzhèng lái shǐ sìfāng guīhuà。
Scholars of ancient times suggested that the emperor should adopt a policy of benevolence as a way to make people of all walks of life come and pledge allegiance to the country.
他的后婚妻子很贤惠，把他照顾得很好。

Xiǎo Hóng jīngcháng xiàng biérén kuāshì zìjǐ yǒu duō xiánhuì。
Xiaohong always boasts that she is genial and prudent.
大凡古代的名臣贤士都有后世皇帝为其立碑以记其功德。
Dàfán gǔdài de míngchén xiánshì dōu yǒu hòushì huángdì wèi qí lìbēi yǐ jì qí gōngdé。
The virtures and merits of most famous ministers, and virtuous scholars of ancient times were recorded by erecting monuments by later emperors.
关于文学，还得请前贤多多指教。
Guānyú wénxué，hái děi qǐng qiánxián duōduō zhǐjiào。
Your honored advice and comments on literature are appreciated.
时贤聚此，共商社稷，真是国家幸事啊。
Shíxián jùcǐ，gòngshāng shèjì，zhēnshì guójiā xìngshì a。
It\'s indeed fortunate for the nation that the contemporary elite are gathering together to discuss social issues.
她是个贤惠和善的媳妇，嫁到夫家后，把婆媳叔嫂关系处理得很融洽。

She is a virtuous and kind daughter-in-law, getting along well with her husband\'s brothers and sisters-in-law after marriage.
他在本镇德高望重、素有贤名。
Tā zài běn zhèn dégāo wàngzhòng、sùyǒu xiánmíng。
He has a good reputation, and is highly respected in our town.
我们要以先贤为榜样，在实践中不断进步。

My uncle is always proud of having a virtuous wife.

装扮成朋友的敌人是最危险的。
Zhuāngbàn chéngpéngyou de dírén shì zuì wēixiǎn de。
The most dangerous enemy is one who disguises himself as a friend.
小红和小强玩过家家，小红总是装扮成妈妈的样子。
Xiǎo Hóng hé Xiǎo Qiáng wán guòjiājiā，Xiǎo Hóng zǒngshì zhuāngbàn chéng māma de yàngzi。
Xiaohong always plays the role of mother, while she and Xiaoqiang playing families.
白天的时候，小偷装扮成收废品的小贩潜入小区踩道。
Báitiān de shíhou，xiǎotōu zhuāngbàn chéng shōufèipǐn de xiǎofàn qiánrù xiǎoqū cǎidào。
During day time, the thief disguised himself as a peddler who collects garbage, and cased the site.
他一身短打装扮，干净利索。
Tā yìshēn duǎndǎ zhuāngbàn，gānjìng lìsuo。
He looks very neat in Chinese-style jacket and trousers.
他乔装改扮，俨然就是一位教书先生。
Tā qiáozhuāng gǎibàn，yǎnrán jiùshì yíwèi jiāoshū xiānshēng。
He disguised himself as a teacher.
他乔装打扮了一下就混进了舞厅。
Tā qiáozhuāng dǎbàn le yíxià jiù hùnjìn le wǔtīng。
He went into the ballroom in disguise.
他总是打扮成老派的装束，看起来也蛮有意思。
Tā zǒngshì dǎbànchéng lǎopài de zhuāngshù，kànqǐlái yě mányǒu yìsi。
He always wears obsolete clothes and looks very funny.
一身帅气的装扮。
装扮起来越发漂亮了。

dǎbàn de cìyǎn

be dressed like a student

打扮入时
dǎbàn rùshí
be fashionably dressed

俗家打扮
sújiā dǎbàn
in a layman\'s attire

dǎbàn de yāolǐyāoqì de
be seductively dressed
你这身儿打扮太招眼。
Nǐ zhè shēnr dǎbàn tài zhāoyǎn。

play a most inglorious part

bànyǎn le bùguāngcǎi de juésè
play a contemptible role

bànyǎn xiǎochǒu juésè
play the buffoon

Nà jiùshì tāmen duì xié\'è mùshī suǒzuò de。
那就是他们对邪恶牧师所做的。
In the name of Jesus, evil spirits were cast out.
Píngjiè Shàngdì de quánwēi，xié\'è de línghún bèi gǎnzǒu le。
凭借上帝的权威，邪恶的灵魂被赶走了。
A glazed and wicked look swept over her face.
Yì zhǒng dāizhì què xié\'è de shénqíng lüèguò tā de liǎnpáng。
一种呆滞却邪恶的神情掠过她的脸庞。
In my dreams, an evil monster was pressing on me.
Wǒ mèngjiàn yìzhī xié\'è de guàishòu yònglì yāzhe wǒ。
我梦见一只邪恶的怪兽用力压着我。
Some people have little power to do good, and have likewise little strength to resist evil.
Mǒuxiē rén méiyǒu nénglì zuòhǎo shì，tóngshí yě méiyǒu nénglì zǔzhǐ xié\'è de dōngxi。
某些人没有能力做好事，同时也没有能力阻止邪恶的东西。
He felt the presence of an evil force.
Tā gǎnshòudàole xié\'è lìliàng de cúnzài。
他感受到了邪恶力量的存在。
Eventually the family left the house to the devices of this malevolent force.
Zuìzhōng，zhè yì jiā rén qūfú yú xié\'è shìlì ér líkāile fángzi。
最终，这一家人屈服于邪恶势力而离开了房子。
The Florida eagles have a fierce baleful look.
Fóluólǐdá yīng cháng de xiōngměng xié\'è。
佛罗里达鹰长得凶猛邪恶。
He was grimly satisfied.
Tā dédàole xié\'è de mǎnzú。
他得到了邪恶的满足。
He\'s a tinpot hitler.

zǒu xiédào
lead a depraved life; abandon oneself to evil ways

rǎngchú jiānxié

玩邪的
wán xié de 
employ underhand means; not play fair

Zánmen àn yuánzé bànshì，jué bùgǎo xié de wāi de。

zǒu xiédào
lead a depraved life; abandon oneself to evil ways

xié\'è de niàntou
wicked thoughts

zǒu shàngxiélù
take to evil ways

bǎ mǒurén yǐnxiàng xiélù
lead sb. astray
这天气真邪门儿，这时候还下雪。

What strange weather—snowing at this time of the year!
他起了邪念。
Tā qǐ le xiéniàn。
A wicked idea came into his head.
使正气上升，邪气下降
Shǐ zhèngqì shàngshēng，xiéqì xiàjiàng
encourage healthy trends and check unhealthy ones
她是一个不信邪的正直女子。
Tā shì yígè bú xìnxié de zhèngzhí nǚzǐ。

yǒulì de dǎjī le wāifēngxiéqì

助长歪风邪气
zhùzhǎngwāifēngxiéqì 
encourage the evil trends
犯有罪错的大部分人员是可以改邪归正的。
Fànyǒu zuìcuò de dàbùfen rényuán shì kěyǐ gǎixiéguīzhèng de。
Most of those who have committed crimes are capable of turning over a new leaf.
他系上了红腰带，说是为了避邪。
Tā jìshàng le hóngyāodài，shuō shì wéi le bìxié。
He had a red band on his waist to ward off evil spirits.
对于邪恶势力我们不应重足而立，而是要奋起抗争。

We shouldn’t cower when confronted by evil forces, we should rise and fight them.
只有从重处理这类案件，才能遏制住这股邪风。
Zhǐyǒu cóngzhòng chǔlǐ zhè lèi ànjiàn，cáinéng èzhìzhù zhè gǔ xiéfēng。
Only by giving serious punishment to this kind of case can this unhealthy trend be put under control.
奶奶说佩带宝玉可以发祥避邪，可她不信。
Nǎinai shuō pèidài bǎoyù kěyǐ fāxiáng bìxié，kě tā bú xìn。
She doesn\'t believe grandma when she says that wearing jade helps one avoid evil.
老中医给我开了几服扶正祛邪的药。
Lǎo zhōng yī gěi wǒ kāi le jǐ fù fúzhèng qūxié de yào。
The old doctor prescribed some medicine to improve my health.
古时压岁钱是为了避邪。
Gǔshí yāsuìqián shì wèi le bìxié。
In the old times, money given to children as a lunar New Year\'s gift was for the purpose of avoiding evil spirits.
在博物馆里，我们看见了那柄有名的莫邪宝剑。
Zài bówùguǎn lǐ，wǒmen kànjiàn le nà bǐng yǒumíng de mòxié bǎojiàn。
In the museum, we saw the famous Moxie double-edged sword.
民间传说佩戴貔貅玉佩可以辟邪、招财。

她看小说入邪了，整天胡思乱想。
Tā kàn xiǎoshuō rùxié le，zhěngtiān húsī luànxiǎng。
She is entranced by novels and indulges herself in her wild imagination all day long.
我们一定要杜绝考试作弊的歪风邪气。
Wǒmen yídìng yào dùjué kǎoshì zuòbì de wāifēng xiéqì。
We must eradicate the unhealthy tendency of cheating in exams.
爷爷是个正人君子，从不取邪财。

My grandfather is an upright person who never touches illegal money.
我从不迷信，但这件事说起来还真够邪乎的。
Wǒ cóngbùmíxìn，dàn zhèjiànshì shuōqǐlái hái zhēn gòu xiéhū de。
I am not a superstitious person, but this thing sounds really weird.
你这是邪火攻心，需要服点降火的药。

You are suffering from excessive internal heat and need some medicine to treat it.
你现在可别去惹他，他正一肚子邪火没地方发呢。

这个人跟常人不一样，做起事来特别邪行。

传说中的璇玑星可以辟邪，你相信吗？

恒等式
hénɡděnɡshì
identical equation; identity
An identity is true regardless of the values of its variables.
恒等式中的变量变化不影响恒等式的成立。
identity and equality are transitive relations
恒等式与等式是传递关系
The teacher gave students a list of identities for X.
老师给了学生们含X的恒等式的列表。
The identity under numerical multiplication is 1.
Zài shùzì chéngfǎ zhōng，héngděngshì shì 1。
在数字乘法中，恒等式是1。

在一场毫无胜算的战争中拼搏是毫无意义的。
They strive for security by truculently asserting their own interests.
Tāmen tōngguò pīnmìng wéihù zìshēnlìyì lái zhēngqǔ ānquán bǎozhàng。
他们通过拼命维护自身利益来争取安全保障。
汉语拼音字母有手写体和印刷体两种体式。
Hànyǔ pīnyīn zìmǔ yǒu shǒuxiětǐ hé yìnshuātǐ liǎngzhǒng tǐshì。
There are two forms of the Chinese phonetic alphabet, the cursive and the printed.
汉语拼音字母
Hànyǔ pīnyīn zìmǔ 
the Chinese phonetic alphabet
宝宝刚5岁，已经开始学习拼音字母了。

transliterate Chinese characters into the Chinese Phonetic Alphabet

zhìdìng《Hànyǔ Pīnyīn Fāng\'àn》 
work out The Scheme for the Chinese Phonetic Alphabet
汉语拼音字母
Hànyǔ pīnyīn zìmǔ 
the Chinese phonetic alphabet

These primary school students are learning how to look for Chinese characters in a dictionary by their phonetic transcription.
国音符号在汉语拼音通行后被停用。
Guóyīn fúhào zài hànyǔ pīnyīn tōngxíng hòu bèi tíngyòng。

The Beijing 2008 Summer Olympic Games will promote, and carry out the spirit of the games.
这匹马的吃口变小了，得去看兽医。
Zhèpǐmǎ de chīkǒu biàn xiǎo le，děi qù kàn shòuyī。
The horse has lost its appetite recently so it needs to see a doctor.
一匹骏马在大草原上驰行。
Yì pǐ jùnmǎ zài dà cǎoyuán shàng chíxíng。
A fine horse is running fast on the grassy plain.
那匹马正在倒噍。
Nà pǐ mǎ zhèngzài dǎojiào。
The horse is chewing the cud.
这匹马倒在地上，不住地蹬达。
Zhèpǐmǎ dǎozài dìshàng，búzhù de dēngdá。
The horse collapsed on the floor, but carried on kicking.
他买了一匹黑胶绸。
Tā mǎi le yìpǐ hēijiāochóu。
He bought a rust-coloured variety of summer silk.
这匹马被画得活龙活现，十分逼真。
Zhèpǐmǎ bèi huà de huólóng huóxiàn，shífēn bīzhēn。
This horse was painted vividly, true to life.
看看这匹马，甲胄这么重，哪儿还跑得快啊！
Kànkàn zhè pǐ mǎ，jiǎzhòu zhème zhòng，nǎr hái pǎo de kuài a！
How can a horse like this run fast, when it is encumbered with armor?
你给这匹马戴上嚼口和笼头。
Nǐ gěi zhè pǐ mǎ dàishàng jiáokǒu hé lóngtóu。
Put the bit of the bridle into the mouth of the horse and put a halter on it as well.
今年春天这匹骒马又生下了一个漂亮的马驹。

The mare gave birth to another pretty colt this spring.
这匹马真懒，拉套时竟然不出力！
Zhèpǐmǎ zhēn lǎn，lātào shí jìngrán bùchūlì！
The horse is so lazy that it doesn\'t pull the cart hard.
水中的涟漪在阳光的照射下似锦缎布匹一样光滑油亮。
Shuǐ zhōng de liányī zài yángguāng de zhàoshè xià sì jǐnduàn bùpǐ yíyàng guānghuá yóuliàng。
The ripples on the water are as smooth and bright as a brocade under the sunshine.
这是一匹烈马，很难被人驯服。
Zhè shì yìpǐ lièmǎ，hěnnán bèi rén xúnfú。
This is a hot-tempered horse, so it is difficult to be tamed.
这匹马品相极好，一看就是龙驹。
Zhèpǐmǎ pǐn xiàng jíhǎo，yíkàn jiùshì lóngjū。
This horse looks very nice and can be seen as a fine steed at first sight.
我向马倌儿借了两匹快马。
Wǒ xiàng mǎguānr jiè le liǎng pǐ kuàimǎ。
I borrowed two first-grade horses from the stableman.
这是要靠集体力量团结合作的事情，个人的匹夫之勇有什么用呀？

从匹马单枪到团队合作，他们的生意越做越好了。

一匹马飞奔过来，人们都赶紧闪道。

这匹老马由于长年的劳累，已经瘦骨嶙峋了。

这匹烈马挣断了我的套马杆狂奔起来。

The horse broke away from my horse pole and ran wild.
这匹骏马在广阔的草原上奔跑腾跃。

骑在那匹白马上的一定是他们的头人。

这些马匹是用来打仗的，不能随便役用。

我们家三代人一直驯养马匹。

The horse has a mineral lick which she will not touch.

Tā hé tóngbàn lìjí chūqù zhàoliào mǎpǐ。
他和同伴立即出去照料马匹。

Tā de nùhè shǐ mǎpǐ shòudàole jīngxià。

He was trying to win by throwing mud at his opponent.
Tā shìtú yǐ pòhuài duìshǒu de míngshēng lái yíngdé shènglì。
他试图以破坏对手的名声来赢得胜利。
He had a very marginal victory with only 180 more votes in his favor.
Tā jǐn yǐ yībǎibāshí piào de wēiruòyōushì yíngdéle shènglì。
他仅以180票的微弱优势赢得了胜利。
Torino in Italy won the right to host the last Winter Olympic Games.
意大利都灵赢得上届冬奥会的主办权。
They won by a short head!
Tāmen yíngdé le shǎoliàng shènglì。
他们赢得了少量胜利。
The forces of reaction carried the election.
Bǎoshǒupài lìliàng yíngdéle xuǎnjǔ shènglì。
保守派力量赢得了选举胜利。
It aided him materially in winning the argument.
Tā zài tā yíngdé biànlùn de shènglì fāngmiàn qǐdàole hěn dà de zuòyòng。
它在他赢得辩论的胜利方面起到了很大的作用。
This alliance won the the war.
Zhège tóngméngguó yíngdéle zhànzhēng de shènglì。
这个同盟国赢得了战争的胜利。
He and Rose Lipman\'s brother courted the same girl, only Mr Lipman won.
Tā hé Luósī·Lìpǔmàn de dìdi yìqǐ zhuīqiú zhège nǚhái，zhǐshì Lìpǔmàn xiānsheng yíng le。
他和罗斯·利普曼的弟弟一起追求这个女孩，只是利普曼先生赢了。

以领先两个船身的距离赢得划船比赛的胜利

The Arizona Cardinals prevailed and won the Super Bowl.
亚利桑那红雀队表现占优，赢得了超级碗。
He bounced back by winning an overwhelming election victory.
Tā tōngguò yíngdé yí cì shìbùkědǎng de xuǎnjǔ shènglì xùnsùhuīfùle guòlái。
他通过赢得一次势不可挡的选举胜利迅速恢复了过来。
The team chalked up another victory, the last one quite undeservedly, in my opinion.
Zhège duì huòqǔle yòu yí cì de shènglì，dànshì wǒ rènwéi zuìhòu yì chǎng yíng de bìng bú lìngrénxìnfú。
这个队获取了又一次的胜利，但是我认为最后一场赢的并不令人信服。
He won the crown in Paris last month when he beat the Italian champion.
Tā shàng gè yuè zài bālí yíngdéle guìguān，dāngshí tā dǎbàile Yìdàlì guànjūn。
他上个月在巴黎赢得了桂冠，当时他打败了意大利冠军。
We almost won，but the opposite team got the match in the end，it was a close call.

我们差点就胜利了，但是对手死里逃生，最终赢得了比赛。
这场价格大战，两家公司都不是真正的赢家。
Zhèchǎng jiàgé dàzhàn，liǎng jiā gōngsī dōu búshì zhēnzhèng de yíngjiā。
Neither of the two companies won in the price war.
不要太得意了，这注定是场没有赢家的比赛！
Búyào tài déyì le，zhè zhùdìng shì chǎng méiyǒu yíngjiā de bǐsài！
Don\' be so complacent; this is destined to be a competition with no winner.
头家赢钱的几率要大得多。

The organizer of a gambling event is much more likely to win money.
他的骨鲠之气赢得了大家的尊敬。
Tā de gǔgěng zhī qì yíngdé le dàjiā de zūnjìng。
He is so honest and frank that everyone greatly respects him.
他的率直赢得了大家的好评。
Tā de shuàizhí yíngdéle dàjiā de hǎopíng。
His forthrightness won everyone\'s approval.
他的对家牌技高超，赢了不少钱。
Tā de duìjiā páijì gāochāo，yíng le bùshǎo qián。
The person across from him is a very skilled poker player and, not surprisingly, turned out to be the biggest winner in the game, taking home a lot of money.
这位歌唱家苍浑的演唱，赢得了观众们长时间的掌声。
Zhèwèi gēchàngjiā cānghún de yǎnchàng，yíngdé le guānzhòngmen cháng shíjiān de zhǎngshēng。
This singer\'s vigorous voice won a long applause from the audience.

我们只是想知道谁是这次抽奖的最大赢家。
Did you back the winner?
你是否赌赢家？
Fate won\'t accompany you all the time in gambling games.
在赌局中你不可能永远是赢家。

我有时觉得他很好斗。他总是想当赢家。
They determine whether Britain is to be the winner or loser.
Tāmen yào chámíng Yīngguó shì yíngjiā háishì shūjiā。

The winner will be notified immediately and his prize will follow within 21 days.

赢家将马上被公布，他的奖金将在21天后发放。

Wángpái zhōng de Ace shì quèdìngwúyí de yíngjiā。

Are playing against each other or the bank?
Dǔbó zhōng tāmen shì xiānghù duìkàng yíng duìfāng de qián háishì dōu duìkàng zhuāngjiā yíng zhuāngjiā de qián？

Entering into an alliance is a strategy for a smaller country to win a war.

加入联盟是小国家赢得战争的一种战略。
Incredibly, He won critical acclaim。
他不可思议地赢得了批评家们的称赞。
You will win this competition. You are a better painter that anybody else.
这场比赛你一定会赢，因为你是最好的画家。
The old politician refused to use dirty tricks to win the election.

这位老政治家拒绝使用卑鄙的手段赢得选举。
他的绝对公正和疾恶如仇赢得了群众的信任和拥护。
Tā de juéduì gōngzhènghé jí\'èrúchóu yíngdé le qúnzhòng de xìnrèn hé yōnghù。
His absolute fairness and abhorrence of evil won him the confidence and support of the masses.

有这股子狂劲，没准他真能赢得最后的胜利。

With his fanaticism, he may win at last.

中国女排力战美国队，以3：2赢得了比赛的胜利。

The Chinese volleyball team fought against the American team fierecly, and won the game at 3-2.

Her beautiful appearance won my favor at once.
她有靓丽的外表和动人的歌喉，赢得了无数歌迷的爱戴。

他一曲唱罢，赢得了满堂的喝彩。

After singing one song, he met with applause from the whole audience.
他在舞台上耍了个枪花，赢得了观众长时间的掌声。
Tā zài wǔtái shàng shuǎ le gè qiānghuā，yíngdé le guānzhòng cháng shíjiān de zhǎngshēng。

由于我们利用了最佳的时间抢攻，才赢得了这场战役。

It was because we sped up the attack at the right time that we won the battle.

我玩儿套圈儿游戏时赢得了这个小兔子玩具。

When playing quoits, I won this rabbit toy.

The actors\' wonderful performance won the audience\'s acclaim.

We have the confidence and also the ability to win the match.
经过90分钟的拼搏，我们终于赢得了那场足球赛。

By going all out for ninety minutes, we finally won the football match.
这次比赛，他为学校赢得了荣誉。

He won glory for the school in this competition.
我对赢得比赛有十二分的信心。

I\'m one hundred per cent confident of winning the competition.
他的率直赢得了大家的好评。
Tā de shuàizhí yíngdéle dàjiā de hǎopíng。
His forthrightness won everyone\'s approval.
这场比赛咱们一定得赢，不能挫了锐气。
Zhèchǎng bǐsài zánmen yídìng děi yíng，bùnéng cuò le ruìqì。
We\'ve got to win the game, otherwise we\'ll lose our momentum.
打得赢就打，打不赢就走。
Dǎ de yíngjiù dǎ，dǎ bùyíngjiù zǒu。
Fight when you can win, move away when you can\'t.
他不过是在社区象棋比赛上连赢了两局，就傲慢得目无余子起来！
Tā búguò shì zài shèqū xiàng qí bǐsài shàng lián yíng le liǎng jú，jiù àomàn de mùwú yúzǐ qǐlái！
He has only won two games in the go match in the community, but he has already been haughty.

今年，我们的团队赢得了大奖。

他的学识赢得了其他学生的尊重。

如果你想在这个公司赢得一席之地，就要学会如何应对困难。

得知自己无法赢得这场比赛时，他深深地叹了口气。

他们的奋战精神帮他们赢得了这场比赛。

这名演员一上台就赢得了热情的掌声。

她非常有可能会赢得这场比赛。

如果我们团结一致，就会赢得这场比赛。
Winning the game this time is the most important thing for us.
对我们来说，赢得这场比赛才是最重要的。
They won the race, although it cost them a lot of money.
虽然花了很多钱，但重要的是他们赢得了比赛。

数月后，州长的计划赢得了当地居民的支持。
He worked really hard to win her love.
他真的很努力去赢得她的爱。

由于对手发球触网，他们才能赢得了比赛。

这个队赢得了冠军，使得队员们兴奋异常。

他用力击球，为他的球队赢得了五分。

全体国民都不确定谁将赢得今年的选举。

她赢得了比赛，我感到嫉妒不已。

本来我有机会赢得比赛的，却被我彻底搞砸了。

这个队准备好了为赢得冠军而努力奋斗。

他的动力就是赢得游戏的最后奖项。
The agency has won two important new accounts.
代理公司赢得了两个重要的新客户。
to win sb\'s affection
赢得某人的爱慕
It was a risky operation, but might buy more time.
这样做有风险，但可能会赢得更多的时间。
They won the vote by a clear majority.
他们赢得绝对多数选票。
to win by default
因对手未出场而赢得比赛
to win sb\'s favour
赢得某人的好感
The two opposition parties together won 29 per cent of the vote.
两个反对党加起来赢得29%的选票。

Tā duì yíngdé tā de fāngxīn bú bào rènhé xīwàng。
他对赢得她的芳心不抱任何希望。
I think I stand a good chance of winning this competition.
Wǒ juéde wǒ dàyǒuxīwàng yíngdé bǐsài。
我觉得我大有希望赢得比赛。
He teaches how to succeed with women.
Tā jiàoshòu rúhé chénggōng yíngdé nǚrén fāngxīn。
他教授如何成功赢得女人芳心。
The class swelled up with pride after winning the contest.
Yíngdé bǐsài zhīhòu，zhège bān bèigǎn zìháo。
赢得比赛之后，这个班倍感自豪。
He was trying to win by throwing mud at his opponent.
Tā shìtú yǐ pòhuài duìshǒu de míngshēng lái yíngdé shènglì。
他试图以破坏对手的名声来赢得胜利。
They played together closely tiding over their difficulties and won the game finally.
Tāmen mìqiè hézuò dùguònánguān，zuìzhōng yíngdé bǐsài。
他们密切合作渡过难关，最终赢得比赛。
I hope to God I win an Oscar tomorrow night.
Wǒ zhēn xīwàng míngtiān wǎnshang néng yíngdé Àosīkǎdàjiǎng。
我真希望明天晚上能赢得奥斯卡大奖。
David already has six gold medals to his credit.
Dàwèi yǐjīng yíngdé liù méi jīnpái。
大卫已经赢得六枚金牌。
He has played solid golf under the gun to win five majors.
Tā zài yālì xià dǎ de fēicháng hǎo，yíngdéle wǔ gè zhòngyào guànjūn。
他在压力下打得非常好，赢得了五个重要冠军。
The fans were urging on the home team to win the game.
Fěnsīmen gǔlì Zhǔchǎngduìwu qù yíngdé zhè chǎng bǐsài。
粉丝们鼓励主场队伍去赢得这场比赛。
Our amateurs were simply not dedicated enough to win at a world level.
Wǒmen de yèyú xuǎnshǒu bù zúyǐ yíngdé shìjiè shuǐzhǔn de bǐsài。
我们的业余选手不足以赢得世界水准的比赛。
He had won again，won hands down.
Tā yòu yí cì huòshèng，bìngqiě yíngdé shífēn qīngsōng。
他又一次获胜，并且赢得十分轻松。
I am proud to have won honours for all of the people.
Néng wèi suǒyǒu de rén yíngdé róngyù， wǒ hěn zìháo。
能为所有的人赢得荣誉，我很自豪。
He won his spurs as a hero while he was still  young.
Zài tā niánqīng de shíhou，tā yǐjīng yíngdéle yīngxióng de měimíng。
在他年轻的时候，他已经赢得了英雄的美名。
She speaks with an almost childlike directness that wins over the most sceptical audience.
Tā zhìqìshízú de shuōhuàshēng yíngdéle dàbùfèn chí huáiyí tàidù de guānzhòng de rèntóng。
她稚气十足的说话声赢得了大部分持怀疑态度的观众的认同。
We are in for a prolonged battle to win over public opinion.
Wǒmen zhèng chǔyú yí gè yíngdé gōngzhòngyúlùn zhīchí de chíjiǔzhàn zhōng。
我们正处于一个赢得公众舆论支持的持久战中。
It is essential that you attempt the required number of questions，in order to play a winning game.
Wèile yíngdé bǐsài，nǐ yào chángshì huídá zhǐdìng shùmù de wèntí，zhè yìdiǎn hěn zhòngyào。
为了赢得比赛，你要尝试回答指定数目的问题，这一点很重要。
My cook was pronounced to have won his spurs.
Wǒ de chúshī bèi gàozhī zìjǐ yíngdéle róngyù。
我的厨师被告知自己赢得了荣誉。
They won the election even though they offered no positive program.
Jǐnguǎn méiyǒu tíchū jījí de shīzhèng jìhuà，tāmen háishì yíngdéle dàxuǎn。
尽管没有提出积极的施政计划，他们还是赢得了大选。
Although he didn\'t win the prize he did get special mention.
Suīrán méiyǒu yíngdé nàgè jiǎngxiàng，dànshì tā dédàole tèbié tímíng。
虽然没有赢得那个奖项，但是他得到了特别提名。
She won a blue ribbon for her baking at the county fair.
Yóuyú zài xiàn shìjí shàng de hōngbèi，tā yíngdéle zuìgāo de róngyù。
由于在县市集上的烘焙，她赢得了最高的荣誉。
They won the championship three years in a row.
Tāmen liánxù sānnián yíngdéle nà xiàng jǐnbiāosài。
他们连续三年赢得了那项锦标赛。
She tried to win his heart with her many attentions.
Tā shìtú yòng xìxīn de hēhù lái yíngdé tā de xīn。
她试图用细心的呵护来赢得他的心。
This behavior will ruin your chances of winning the election.
Zhèyàng de xíngwéi jiānghuì shǐ nǐ yíngdé xuǎnjǔ de jīhuì pòmiè。
这样的行为将会使你赢得选举的机会破灭。
It revived their hope of winning the pennant.
Zhè ràng tāmen chóngxīn ránqǐ yíngdé jiǎng qí de xīwàng。
这让他们重新燃起赢得奖旗的希望。
They won all the concessions they asked for.
Tāmen yíngdéle tāmen suǒ yāoqiú duìfāng zuòchū de yíqiè ràngbù。
他们赢得了他们所要求对方做出的一切让步。
The forces of reaction carried the election.
Bǎoshǒupài lìliàng yíngdéle xuǎnjǔ shènglì。
保守派力量赢得了选举胜利。
His powerful serves won the game.
Tā de dàlì fāqiú shǐ tā yíngdéle bǐsài。
他的大力发球使他赢得了比赛。
He guessed the right number of beans in the jar and won the prize.
Tā cāiduìle guànzhōng dòuzi de shùliàng，cóng\'ér yíngdéle jiǎngjīn。
他猜对了罐中豆子的数量，从而赢得了奖金。
He aced his opponents.
Tā fāqiú yíngdé duìshǒu yì fēn。
他发球赢得对手一分。
The child won everyone\'s heart.
Zhège háizi yíngdéle suǒyǒurén de xǐ\'ài。
这个孩子赢得了所有人的喜爱。
Faint heart ne\'er won fair lady.
Ruǎnruò de xīn cónglái bù néng yíngdé yǎotiǎoshūnǚ de fāngxīn。
软弱的心从来不能赢得窈窕淑女的芳心。
That candidate does not have sufficient visibility to win an election.
Méiyǒu chōngzú de jìxiàng biǎomíng nàgè hòuxuǎnrén huì yíngdé jìngxuǎn。
没有充足的迹象表明那个候选人会赢得竞选。
They are presently attempting to gain a foothold in the russian market.
Tāmen mùqián zhèngzài nǔlì zhēngqǔ zài Éluósī shìchǎng yíngdé yìxízhīdì。
他们目前正在努力争取在俄罗斯市场赢得一席之地。
His charm soon won him affection and popularity.
Tā de mèilì hěnkuài wèi tā yíngdéle àidài hé míngqì。
他的魅力很快为他赢得了爱戴和名气。
Winning the tournament was a cakewalk for him.
Yíngdé jǐnbiāosài duì tā láishuō yìrúfǎnzhǎng。
赢得锦标赛对他来说易如反掌。
He felt safe on his home grounds.
Tā zài zhǔchǎng gǎnjué huì yíngdé bǐsài。
他在主场感觉会赢得比赛。
He counted on the coattails effect to win him the election.
Tā yīkào biérén de yǐngxiǎnglì yíngdéle xuǎnjǔ。
他依靠别人的影响力赢得了选举。
It aided him materially in winning the argument.
Tā zài tā yíngdé biànlùn de shènglì fāngmiàn qǐdàole hěn dà de zuòyòng。
它在他赢得辩论的胜利方面起到了很大的作用。
He won easily.
Tā yíngde hěn qīngsōng。
他赢得很轻松。
His adroit replies to hecklers won him many followers.
Tā duì zhìwènzhě de jīmǐn yìngdá shǐ tā yíngdéle hěn duō zhuīsuízhě。
他对质问者的机敏应答使他赢得了很多追随者。
He won nip and tuck.
Tā yíngdéle yì chǎng shìjūnlìdí de bǐsài。
他赢得了一场势均力敌的比赛。
I didn\'t win; but it was still fun.
我虽然没赢，但还是觉得很好玩儿。
If they win they get a cut of the amount awarded.
Rúguǒ tāmen yíngle，tāmen jiāng dédào shǎngjīn de yíbùfēn。
如果他们赢了，他们将得到赏金的一部分。
I didn\'t win. Still, it was fun.
我没赢。尽管如此，却玩得很开心。
Lawyers in private practice are in business and must make a profit to survive.
Sīrén kāiyè lǜshī jùyǒu yèwù，dàn bìxū qǔdé shēngcún suǒxū de yínglì。
私人开业律师具有业务，但必须取得生存所需的赢利。
If we can\'t win this war, we will have to chuck up the sponge.
Rúguǒ wǒmen bùnéng dǎyíng zhè chǎng zhànzhēng，wǒmen jiù bùdébù rènshū le。
如果我们不能打赢这场战争，我们就不得不认输了。
Compared to the money he won, mine is chicken feed.
Xiāngbǐ tā yíng de qián，wǒ de qián jiǎnzhí bù zhídé yì tí。
相比他赢的钱，我的钱简直不值得一提。
Sometimes I think he is too competitive. He always wants to win!
我有时觉得他很好斗。他总是想当赢家。
They will clap themselves for gaining tuppence and giving a million away to their enemies.
他们赢了两个铜板，却把一百万都输了给敌人，还会为此而自鸣得意呢。
打得赢就打，打不赢就走。
Dǎ de yíngjiù dǎ，dǎ bùyíngjiù zǒu。
Fight when you can win, move away when you can\'t.
他出场准赢。
Tā chūchǎngzhǔn yíng。
If he enters the contest, he\'s sure to win.
这个队一场都没赢，队长都感到灰心了。
Zhège duì yìcháng dōu méi yíng，duìzhǎngdōu gǎndào huīxīn le。
The team had won no games and the captain lost heart.
他的绝对公正和疾恶如仇赢得了群众的信任和拥护。
Tā de juéduì gōngzhènghé jí\'èrúchóu yíngdé le qúnzhòng de xìnrèn hé yōnghù。
His absolute fairness and abhorrence of evil won him the confidence and support of the masses.
投资者抛空往往是为了赢利。
Tóuzīzhě pāokōngwǎngwǎngshì wèi le yínglì。
Investors often sell short for profit.
他轻描淡写地说，“打了两场球都不费力就赢了。”
Tā qīngmiáodànxiě de shuō，“dǎ le liǎng chǎng qiú dōu bú fèilì jiù yíng le。”
He said casually, &quot;We won both games easily.&quot;
为祖国赢得荣誉
wèi zǔguó yíngdé róngyù
win honour for one\'s country
这场比赛咱们一定得赢，不能挫了锐气。
Zhèchǎng bǐsài zánmen yídìng děi yíng，bùnéng cuò le ruìqì。
We\'ve got to win the game, otherwise we\'ll lose our momentum.
要打赢他们还不是手到擒来？
Yào dǎyíng tāmen hái búshì shǒudàoqínlái?
Surely we can beat them hands down!
两个球队要较量一番，非见个输赢不可。
Liǎng gè qiúduì yào jiàoliàng yì fān，fēi jiàn gè shūyíng bùkě。
The two teams are determined to fight it out.
他们常打麻将，而且输赢很大。
Tāmen cháng dǎ májiàng，érqiě shūyíng hěn dà。
They were always playing mahjong, and the winnings and losses were very high.
这场比赛他稳赢。
Zhè chǎngbǐsài tā wěn yíng。
He is certain to win the game.
咱们一定要赢，别让人笑话咱们。
Zánmen yídìngyào yíng，bié ràng rén xiàohua zánmen。
We must win the game, and not give others any chance to laugh at us.
我不信他能赢。
Wǒ bú xìn tā néngyíng。
I don\'t believe he can win.
他们去年赢了我们，这回我们以二比一击败他们，报了一箭之仇。
Tāmen qùnián yíng le wǒmen，zhè huí wǒmen yǐ èr bǐ yī jībài tāmen，bào le yíjiànzhīchóu。
Last year they defeated us, but now we have got even with them by beating them 2∶1.
这场比赛谁赢了？
Zhè chǎngbǐsài shuí yíng le? 
Who won the game?
我下象棋赢不了他。
Wǒ xià xiàng qí yíngbùliǎo tā。
I can\'t beat him at Chinese chess.
赢得独立
yíngdé dúlì 
win (or attain) independence
赢得长时间的掌声
yíngdé chángshíjiān de zhǎngshēng
draw prolonged applause
赢利五百万元
yínglì wǔbǎi wàn yuán 
net a profit of five million yuan
这个厂的产品质量赢得了用户的赞誉。
Zhège chǎng de chǎnpǐn zhìliàngyíngdé le yònghù de zànyù。
The factory has been commended by the consumers for the high quality of its products.
她自信自己能赢。
Tā zìxìn zìjǐ néngyíng。
She is confident that she will win.
篮球比赛我们没能赢他们。
Lánqiú bǐsài wǒmen méinéng yíng tāmen。
果然如我所料，这次他赢了。
Guǒrán rúwǒ suǒliào，zhècì tā yíng le。
As I expected, this time he won.
超级女生的表演唱赢得了阵阵掌声。
Chāojí nǚshēng de biǎoyǎnchàng yíngdé le zhènzhèn zhǎngshēng。
The singing performance of “the super girls” won the audience\'s applause.
庙会上踩高跷的演员赢得了阵阵喝彩声。
Miàohuì shàng cǎigāoqiāo de yǎnyuán yíngdé le zhènzhèn hècǎishēng。
At the Temple Fair, the stilt walker threceived a lot of applause after his performance.
这位歌唱家苍浑的演唱，赢得了观众们长时间的掌声。
Zhèwèi gēchàngjiā cānghún de yǎnchàng，yíngdé le guānzhòngmen cháng shíjiān de zhǎngshēng。
This singer\'s vigorous voice won a long applause from the audience.
看他飞扬踔厉，比赛肯定能赢。
Kàn tā fēiyáng chuōlì，bǐsài kěndìng néng yíng。
Judging by his excited state, it is certain that they will win the competition.
原告打赢了这场官司。
Yuángào dǎyíng le zhèchǎng guānsī。
The plaintiff won the lawsuit.
这场价格大战，两家公司都不是真正的赢家。
Zhèchǎng jiàgé dàzhàn，liǎng jiā gōngsī dōu búshì zhēnzhèng de yíngjiā。
Neither of the two companies won in the price war.
他的对家牌技高超，赢了不少钱。
Tā de duìjiā páijì gāochāo，yíng le bùshǎo qián。
The person across from him is a very skilled poker player and, not surprisingly, turned out to be the biggest winner in the game, taking home a lot of money.
他放话说，今天的比赛我们一定赢。
Tā fànghuà shuō，jīntiān de bǐsài wǒmen yídìng yíng。
He gave his word that we would win today\'s game.
他的骨鲠之气赢得了大家的尊敬。
Tā de gǔgěng zhī qì yíngdé le dàjiā de zūnjìng。
He is so honest and frank that everyone greatly respects him.
他在竞技比赛时虎虎生风，赢得了很多喝彩声。
Tā zài jìngjì bǐsài shí hǔhǔ shēngfēng，yíngdé le hěnduō hècǎishēng。
In the athletic competition he acted powerfully, and won a lot of applause.
能拿下这个火力点我们就能打赢这场战役！
Néng náxià zhège huǒlìdiǎn wǒmen jiùnéng dǎyíng zhèchǎng zhànyì！
We will win this war if we can get this firing-point!
应聘时他的优秀表现赢得了面试考官的赞许。
Yīngpìn shí tā de yōuxiù biǎoxiàn yíngdé le miànshì kǎoguān de zànxǔ。
When accepting the offer of employment, his excellent performance won the examiner\'s praise.
这几次您下棋都赢了我，我已经口服心服了！
Zhè jǐ cì nín xiàqí dōu yíng le wǒ，wǒ yǐjing kǒufú xīnfú le！
You defeated me several times in chess; now I concede defeat, from the bottom of my heart.
有这股子狂劲，没准他真能赢得最后的胜利。
Yǒu zhègǔzi kuángjìn，méizhǔn tā zhēn néng yíngdé zuìhòu de shènglì。
With his fanaticism, he may win at last.
朝鲜冷面正在慢慢地赢得中国百姓的喜爱。
Cháoxiǎn lěngmiàn zhèngzài mànmàn de yíngdé Zhōngguó bǎixìng de xǐ\'ài。
Korean Cold Noodles are gradually gaining popularity among common Chinese people.
中国女排力战美国队，以3：2赢得了比赛的胜利。
Zhōngguó nǚpái lìzhàn Měiguóduì，yǐ sān bǐ èr yíngdé le bǐsài de shènglì。
The Chinese volleyball team fought against the American team fierecly, and won the game at 3-2.
她亮丽的外表马上赢得了我的好感。
Tā liànglì de wàibiǎo mǎshàng yíngdé le wǒ de hǎogǎn。
Her beautiful appearance won my favor at once.
她有靓丽的外表和动人的歌喉，赢得了无数歌迷的爱戴。
Tā yǒu liànglì de wàibiǎo hé dòngrén de gēhóu，yíngdé le wúshù gēmí de àidài。
With a beautiful appearance, and appealing singing voice, she has won love and esteem from thousands of fans.
他一曲唱罢，赢得了满堂的喝彩。
Tā yì qǔ chàngbà，yíngdé le mǎntáng de hècǎi。
After singing one song, he met with applause from the whole audience.
他不过是在社区象棋比赛上连赢了两局，就傲慢得目无余子起来！
Tā búguò shì zài shèqū xiàng qí bǐsài shàng lián yíng le liǎng jú，jiù àomàn de mùwú yúzǐ qǐlái！
He has only won two games in the go match in the community, but he has already been haughty.
他在舞台上耍了个枪花，赢得了观众长时间的掌声。
Tā zài wǔtái shàng shuǎ le gè qiānghuā，yíngdé le guānzhòng cháng shíjiān de zhǎngshēng。
He played with a short spear on stage, which won the audience\'s prolonged applause.
由于我们利用了最佳的时间抢攻，才赢得了这场战役。
Yóuyú wǒmen lìyòng le zuì jiā de shíjiān qiǎnggōng，cái yíngdé le zhèchǎng zhànyì。
It was because we sped up the attack at the right time that we won the battle.
执政者做事要顺乎民心，只有这样才能赢得百姓拥护。
Zhízhèngzhě zuòshì yào shùnhū mínxīn，zhǐyǒu zhèyàng cáinéng yíngdé bǎixìng yōnghù。
Only when a ruler does things in compliance with people\'s wishes can he win their support.
我玩儿套圈儿游戏时赢得了这个小兔子玩具。
Wǒ wánr tàoquānr yóuxì shí yíngdé le zhège xiǎotùzi wánjù。
When playing quoits, I won this rabbit toy.
头家赢钱的几率要大得多。
Tóujiā yíngqián de jīlǜ yào dàdéduō。
The organizer of a gambling event is much more likely to win money.
每次他打麻将赢钱的时候都会高兴得忘其所以。
Měi cì tā dǎ májiàng yíngqián de shíhou dōuhuì gāoxīng de wàngqí suǒyǐ。
Whenever he wins money in mahjong, he is so happy that he forgets himself.
我们学校赢得了校际辩论会的胜利。
Wǒmen xuéxiào yíngdé le xiàojì biànlùnhuì de shènglì。
Our school won the inter-school debate competition.
他表演了旋子，赢得喝彩声一片。
Tā biǎoyǎn le xuànzi，yíngdé hècǎishēng yí piàn。
His performance in somersaults won a good round of applause.
学术性的报刊销售量不大，不以赢利为目的。

jìngòng
pay tribute (to a suzerain or emperor)

Wèile nénggòu àn jìhuà wánchéng rènwù，táogōng liányè gǎnzhì le zhè pī táoqì。
In order to finish the task as planned, the potter worked overnight making the earthenware.
她把埋的陶器扒了出来。
Tā bǎ máide táoqì bāle chūlái。
She dug up buried pottery.
这是惟一残存的中国清代陶器样品。
Zhèshì wéiyī cáncúnde Zhōngguó qīngdài táoqìyàngpǐn。
This is the only surviving example of Qing dynasty pottery in China.
China, also known as soft-paste or tender porcelain, is softer: it can be cut with a file, while porcelain cannot.
陶器，也叫幼陶器或软瓷器，它的质地柔软，可以用锉刀切开，但是普通瓷器就不行。
Whereas porcelain is always translucent, china is opaque.
瓷器常常是半透明的，而陶器是不透明的。
a piece of pottery
一件陶器
Almost all potteries found in the tomb were sacrifices.
几乎所有在这个墓里找到的陶器都是祭品。
The museum displayed a large collection of Chinese ceramics.
Zhège Bówùguǎn zhǎnlǎnle dàliàng Zhōngguó táoqì。
这个博物馆展览了大量中国陶器。
The research provides new perspectives on how studies of classic pottery might be approached.
Zhè xiàng yánjiū tígōngle guānyú zěnyàng zhuóshǒu yánjiū gǔdài táoqì de xīn guāndiǎn。
这项研究提供了关于怎样着手研究古代陶器的新观点。
The pottery was crated and shipped for its journey.
Zhège táoqì bèi zhuāngxiāng，yòng chuán yùnzǒu。
这个陶器被装箱，用船运走。
The pottery fascinated Cindy more than any of the other souvenirs.
Zhège táoqì shēnshēn xīyǐnle tā，shèngguòle qítā de jìniànpǐn。
这个陶器深深吸引了他，胜过了其他的纪念品。
Their pottery deserves more research than it has received.
Suī yǐ qǔdé yìxiē yánjiūchéngguǒ，tāmen de táoqì réngrán zhídé wǒmen zuò gèng shēnrù de yánjiū。
虽已取得一些研究成果，他们的陶器仍然值得我们做更深入的研究。
Pottery of this cast was found throughout the region.
Zhèzhǒng múzǐ de táoqì zài gāi dìqū dàochù dōuyǒu。
这种模子的陶器在该地区到处都有。
The new style of Minoan pottery was sharply defined.
Kèlǐtèdǎo táoqì de xīn fēnggé fēicháng xiānmíng。
克里特岛陶器的新风格非常鲜明。
The archeologists left the pottery in place.
Kǎogǔxuéjiā bǎ táoqì liúzàile yuánchù。
考古学家把陶器留在了原处。
Earthenware pottery is breakable.
Táoqì yìsuì。
陶器易碎。
Porcelain, often called china or chinaware, is a type of ceramics highly valued for its beauty and strength.
瓷器，又称陶瓷或陶瓷器，是陶瓷制品的一种，因其外观美、强度高，所以价值不菲。
Although porcelain is frequently used as a synonym for china, the two are not identical.
虽然瓷器常常被当作陶瓷的同义词，但两者并不完全相同。
This famous potter hand-builds all of her vessels.
Zhè wèi zhùmíng de táoyìrén yòng shǒugōng zhìzàole tā suǒyǒu de qìmǐn。
这位著名的陶艺人用手工制造了她所有的器皿。
乐陶陶
lètáotáo
(usu. used in rhymes) cheerful; happy; joyful
乐陶陶
lètáotáo
happy and contented
他从小受到古典音乐的熏陶。
Tā cóngxiǎo shòudào gǔdiǎnyīnyuè de xūntáo。
He had been influenced by classical music since he was small.
他演奏的乐曲泠然优美，使人陶醉。
Tā yǎnzòu de yuèqǔ língrán yōuměi，shǐrén táozuì。
The music he is playing is clear, and beautiful that people become intoxicated with it.
陶渊明无心做官，最终选择退隐山林，享受田园生活的乐趣。
Táo Yuānmíng wúxīn zuòguān，zuì zhōng xuǎnzé tuìyǐn shānlín，xiǎngshòu tiányuán shēnghuó de lèqù。
Tao Yuanming was not interested in becoming an official, and finally chose to be a hermit in a forest enjoying the fun of rural life.

陶醉于欢乐之中；因欢乐而陶醉

“乔治·布什乃总统，陶然乐于家中坐，独为莫须有之事，把各士兵送战场。”是一首四行打油诗。

Chǔzài jídù kuàilè zhōng shì fēicháng lìngréntáozuì yě shì fēicháng wēixiǎn de。

Zhè wèi qián quánjīshǒu de gōngzuò jiùshì yòng quántou bǎ nàxiē xiǎng jìnrù zhèjiā sīrén jùlèbù de rén gǎnzǒu。
这位前拳击手的工作就是用拳头把那些想进入这家私人俱乐部的人赶走。
She works the night clubs.
Tā jīngyíng zhè jiā wǎnjiān jùlèbù。
她经营这家晚间俱乐部。
He played the drums at a jazz club.
Tā zài yì jiā juéshìyuè jùlèbù lǐ zuò gǔshǒu。
他在一家爵士乐俱乐部里做鼓手。
The two countries will go on fighting till the bitter end.
这两个国家会一直打到两败俱伤为止。
This guy likes chasing after girls in bars and clubs.
Zhè jiāhuo xǐhuan zài jiǔbā hé Jùlèbù lǐ zhuīqiú nǚháizǐ。
这家伙喜欢在酒吧和俱乐部里追求女孩子。
I supplement my income by dancing at a club on the weekends.
我周末在俱乐部跳舞以补充家用。
When two nations both resort to nuclear deterrence the consequence could be mutual destruction.
Rúguǒ liǎng gè guójiā dōu sùzhū héwēishè，hěn kěnéng dǎozhì liǎngbài-jùshāng de hòuguǒ。
如果两个国家都诉诸核威慑，很可能导致两败俱伤的后果。
我们公司逐渐走出低谷，百废俱兴。
Wǒmen gōngsī zhújiàn zǒuchū dīgǔ，bǎifèijùxīng。
Our company has moved past a low point. Everything is changing for the better.
百废俱兴。
这串阿拉伯数字就是我电子邮箱的密码。
Zhè chuàn ālābóshùzì jiùshì wǒ diànzǐ yóuxiāng de mìmǎ。
This series of Arabic numerals is the password to my email account.

墨西哥人喜欢吃辛辣的食物。
Mexico\'s inflation jumped dramatically in 1976 and 1982.
1976至1982年间，墨西哥通货膨胀显著激增。
In 1982, the Mexican peso hit an all time low against the US dollar.
1982年，墨西哥比索对美元汇率跌至历史最低值。
Monterrey lies to the north Mexico.
蒙特雷位于墨西哥的北部。
Small hotels run all the way to the Mexican border.
小旅馆遍布沿途，一直延伸至墨西哥边界。
&quot;Would you like Mexican or Indian food?&quot; &quot;I\'m easy. You choose.&quot;
“你想要墨西哥餐还是印度餐？”“我听你的，你选吧。”
Mexicans have a tradition of firing off guns to welcome  the new year.
墨西哥人有鸣枪迎新年的传统。
Chocolate originated from Mexico.
巧克力起源于墨西哥。
I\'m a Mexican citizen but have been living in China for two years now.
我是墨西哥人，但已经在中国住了两年了。
The citizens of Mexico City live with a serious pollution problem.
墨西哥城的居民生活在严重污染的环境里。
In Mexico,a lot of food is made from corn.
在墨西哥，许多食品都是用玉米做的。
There are no direct flights to China from Mexico.
没有从墨西哥直飞中国的航班。
Corruption is the real disease of Mexico City.
腐败才是墨西哥城里真正的祸害。
Mexican peso took a big dive in 1976.
墨西哥比索在1976年经历了一次大幅度下跌。
After a tough week on the markets the Mexican stock market has stabilized.
经过一个星期的动荡，墨西哥的股票市场稳定了下来。
Mexico\'s flag depicts an eagle eating a rattlesnake while perched on a cactus.
墨西哥国旗描绘了一只栖息在仙人掌上的鹰啄食响尾蛇的图案。
Many Mexican small businesses folded due to NAFTA.
由于北美自由贸易协议的签订，许多墨西哥小企业不得不闭门关张。
In Mexico, the sale of alcohol is forbidden to people under the age of 18.
在墨西哥是不允许向未满18岁的儿童出售酒精饮料的。
Mexico City has a population of almost 20,000,000, which makes it the 2nd biggest city in the world.
墨西哥城有2000万人口，是世界第二大城市。
They are driving to Mexico on Tuesday.
周二他们要开车去墨西哥。
He is in charge of the implementation of high quality early childhood education programs in New Mexico.
他在新墨西哥州负责儿童高质早期教育项目的执行工作。
Texas was once ruled by Mexico.
德克萨斯州曾经受墨西哥管辖。
She wore full traditional Mexican costume on her visit home.
Tā chuānzhe wánzhěng de Mòxīgē fúshì huíjiā tànwàng。
她穿着完整的墨西哥服饰回家探望。
We drove into Mexico City to go to a shopping mall.
Wǒmen qū chē qiánwǎng Mòxīgēchéng，láidào yí gè dàxíng gòuwù zhōngxīn。
我们驱车前往墨西哥城，来到一个大型购物中心。
A friend in new mexico said that the order caused no trouble out there.
Xīn mòxīgēzhōu de yí gè péngyou shuō nà xiàng fǎlìng bìngwèi zài nàlǐ yǐnqǐ fēngcháo。
新墨西哥州的一个朋友说那项法令并未在那里引起风潮。
Jalapeno peppers are very hot.
Mòxīgē hújiāo fēicháng là。
墨西哥胡椒非常辣。
I hate Mexican food.
Wǒ bù xǐhuan Mòxīgē shípǐn。
我不喜欢墨西哥食品。
A Mexican Hairless is about the size of a fox terrier and hairless except for a tufts on the head and tail.
Mòxīgēwúmáo quǎn de dàxiǎo dàyuē yǔ húgǒu yíyàng，quánshēn wú máo，zhǐshì zài nǎodai hé wěiba shàng yǒuxiē róngmáo。
墨西哥无毛犬的大小大约与狐狗一样，全身无毛，只是在脑袋和尾巴上有些绒毛。
Mexico is a country of mestizos, criollos, and indigenes.
Mòxīgē shì yí gè yóu hùnxuè zhǒng rén、Xībānyá yì rén、tǔzhùrén zǔchéng de guójiā。
墨西哥是一个由混血种人、西班牙裔人、土著人组成的国家。
This mexican town has become a narco-state that ships 100 pounds of cocaine to the united states every day.
Zhè mòxīgē xiǎozhèn yǐ chéngwéi yígè dúpǐn wángguó，měitiān yǒu 100 bàng kěkǎyīn cóng zhèli liúrù měiguó。
这墨西哥小镇已成为一个毒品王国，每天有100磅可卡因从这里流入美国。
Financially hard-pressed mexican hotels are lowering their prices.
Jùdà de zījīn yālì xià，Mòxīgē lǚguǎn zhèngzài jiàngjià。
巨大的资金压力下，墨西哥旅馆正在降价。
Mexico is unlikely to secure the same favourable protection for next year.
Mòxīgē bú tài kěnéng wèi míngnián gòudé tóngyàng yōuhuì de bǎohù。
墨西哥不太可能为明年购得同样优惠的保护。
Unfortunately, Mexicans hear about them all the time.
búxìng de shì，Mòxīgē rén chángcháng tīngshuō cǐlèi shìjiàn。
不幸的是，墨西哥人常常听说此类事件。
